column2: You will be responsible for the development and execution of all marketing and communications strategies for Acoem within the UK.          As a Marketing Communication Specialist, you will be responsible for overseeing the development of goals, strategies, and implementation plans to execute comprehensive marketing campaigns for the UK region (Based in India). You will also be responsible for managing and promoting Acoem solutions and services as well as executing new global product launches, and services to meet profitability goals and targets.        Brand Strategy and Messaging      You will be responsible for developing    and executing a results-driven, multi-platform communications strategy and plan in line with corporate and brand direction while reflecting local priorities.          Content Marketing and Thought Leadership      Deep understanding of content marketing and thought leadership strategies to create content that establishes the company as a trusted authority in the industry. You will be responsible for developing a content marketing plan that includes a mix of thought leadership articles, whitepapers, case studies, and other types of content that align with the company s overall business objectives.        Marketing Strategies for Lead Generation      You will be responsible for generating leads and nurturing them throughout the sales funnel. You will need to have a solid understanding of lead generation tactics such as email marketing, social media, SEO, PPC, and events, and be able to develop campaigns that drive high-quality leads. Experience with marketing automation and CRM systems to manage lead data and track campaign performance will be preferable.        Sales Enablement and Collateral Development      You will be responsible for creating sales collateral and tools that enable the sales team to close deals more effectively. This includes developing sales presentations, product sheets, case studies, and other sales collateral that communicates the value proposition of the company s products and services.        Events and Product Launches      You will be responsible for planning and executing events, trade shows and product launches that showcase the company s products and services to target audiences. You will need to have experience with event planning and logistics, as well as a solid understanding of product launch strategies. You will also need to have strong project management skills to ensure that events and launches are executed on time and within budget.        Campaign Measurement and Optimization      Strong analytical skills to measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and optimize them for maximum ROI. You will be responsible for tracking key performance metrics such as website traffic, lead generation, engagement rates, and sales conversions. You will also need to be able to use data insights to identify opportunities for optimization and adjust strategies accordingly.      Desired Skills And Experience          A degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field          Prior experience of 7-8 years in a similar role          Exceptional verbal & written communication skills          Proficient in developing, executing, and measuring demand-generation programs that keep customers and prospects engaged throughout the funnel          Strong knowledge of content development and Digital Marketing          Strong analytical skills with the ability to analyze data and use insights to inform marketing strategies          High level of attention to detail, including a proven ability to manage multiple and competing priorities simultaneously          Excellent interpersonal skills and adept at building relationships with different team members and stakeholders

Job Description:- Roles and Responsibilities   Marketing Manager should be a go getter and generate leads and convert the leads into monetary benefits for the organization. We expect good business acumen from the marketing managers, for the decision making analysis and adding value to the business. Marketing managers are responsible for developing, implementing and executing strategic marketing plans for their designated area of business. Marketing manager should be a good team player and have good interpersonal skills with customers in the designated area.  Managers are likely to work closely with other employees in areas such as advertising, market research, production, sales and distribution.  Coordinate with the management in the development of marketing programs and criteria to achieve sales goals.  The role of the marketing manager will be to develop and oversee marketing campaigns to promote products and services.  Manage the development of all communication for both Business to Business and Business to Consumer activity.   Generation of various marketing reports. Also, the Marketing Manager will be responsible for market research, competitor analysis, optimizing website content and SEO.  Generate lead, help in sales activities.  Must travel to clients place and enhance business.         Desired Candidate Profile   Should have process knowledge of Marketing.  Excellent English Communication Skills - Spoken and Written.  Ability to make important decisions and cope with the pressure of demanding targets and tight deadlines.  Strong inter-personal skills with a persuasive manner, Project management skills with good planning and organizational abilities, including excellent time management skills.  Should be a multi tasker with the ability to handle pressure.  Should have experience in marketing field.  Should know English and regional language.    Job Benefits & Perks  Incentives will be provided based on Achieved Business targets.

column2: Overview: As a Marketing Manager at the mall, you will lead the development and implementation of marketing strategies to drive foot traffic, increase brand awareness, and enhance the overall shopping experience for visitors. Your role involves planning and executing marketing campaigns, managing promotional activities, and fostering relationships with tenants and partners to support the mall's growth and success. Responsibilities: 1. Marketing Strategy: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies and campaigns to promote the mall, its tenants, and events, aligned with business objectives and target audience demographics. 2. Campaign Management: Plan, coordinate, and execute multi-channel marketing campaigns across various platforms, including digital advertising, social media, email marketing, print media, and outdoor signage, to drive foot traffic and engagement. 3. Event Coordination: Organize and promote special events, promotions, and seasonal campaigns at the mall, such as holiday events, sales events, fashion shows, and community outreach programs, to attract visitors and generate excitement. 4. Analytics and Reporting: Monitor, analyze, and report on key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics related to marketing campaigns, foot traffic, customer engagement, and sales to assess performance and inform strategic decision-making. Requirements: 1. Education: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or related field required. Master's degree preferred. 2. Experience: 3-5 years of experience in marketing roles, with demonstrated expertise in developing and executing marketing strategies and campaigns, preferably in the retail or shopping center industry. 3. Creativity: Creative thinking and problem-solving skills to develop innovative marketing campaigns, promotions, and events that resonate with target audiences and differentiate the mall from competitors. 4. Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to articulate marketing strategies, engage with stakeholders, and convey brand messaging effectively across various channels. 5. Analytical Skills: Proficiency in data analysis, market research, and marketing analytics tools to interpret data, track performance metrics, and make data-driven decisions to optimize marketing initiatives. 6. Project Management: Strong organizational and project management skills to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. 7. Customer Focus: Customer-centric mindset with a focus on delivering exceptional shopping experiences and meeting the needs and preferences of mall visitors and tenants. Note: This job description outlines the primary duties and requirements for the Marketing Manager position at the mall but may be subject to change based on the specific needs of the mall and industry trends.

column2: Moris Media is seeking a dynamic and results-oriented    Influencer Marketing Manager    to elevate the moCal brand. Embrace the flexibility and freedom of a remote work environment while shaping cutting-edge influencer marketing campaigns that drive brand visibility, engagement, and success on social media. Youll have the autonomy to develop and execute innovative strategies, build strong influencer relationships, and analyze campaign performance to deliver exceptional results. We offer the opportunity to work from anywhere, as long as you have a reliable internet connection and a passion for influencer marketing. If you thrive in a remote setting and are eager to push boundaries in the digital marketing world, this role is for you!         Strategy Development: Design and implement comprehensive influencer marketing strategies that seamlessly align with moCals brand objectives and overall marketing goals.     Influencer Identification & Outreach: Proactively research, identify, and build relationships with influencers whose audience and values resonate with moCals target market.     Partnership Management: Cultivate and manage strong influencer collaborations, including contract negotiations, content guidance, and ongoing communication.     Campaign Execution: Oversee the planning, execution, and optimization of influencer marketing campaigns, ensuring they deliver on established KPIs in a remote-work environment.     Performance Analysis: Track campaign metrics (e.g., reach, engagement, conversions), analyze data, and provide actionable insights to refine strategies and maximize ROI.     Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work effectively with remote teams in social media, creative, PR, and other relevant departments to develop integrated and impactful campaigns.     Industry Knowledge: Stay up-to-date on the latest influencer marketing trends, best practices, and emerging platforms to drive innovation.     Budget Management: Effectively manage campaign budgets, ensuring cost efficiency and optimal resource allocation within a remote setting.             Essential Qualifications:           Experience:       A minimum of 2-3 years of proven experience specifically in Influencer Marketing.     A track record of successfully developing and executing influencer campaigns.     Experience in managing influencer relationships in a professional setting.           Social Media Savvy:       In-depth understanding of major social media platforms (Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, etc.) and their best practices.     Knowledge of how to engage with influencers and audiences effectively on each platform.           Strategic Thinking:       Ability to develop influencer marketing strategies that align with moCals specific brand identity and overall marketing goals.     Data-driven approach to campaign planning and optimization.           Communication & Negotiation:       Excellent verbal and written communication skills for building strong relationships with influencers.     Strong negotiation skills to secure favorable collaborations.           Analytical Mindset:       Proficiency in using data analysis tools to track campaign performance, make informed decisions, and report insights.           Project Management:       Ability to manage multiple influencer campaigns simultaneously, meeting deadlines and budget constraints.             Highly Desirable Qualifications:           Remote Work Success:    Experience in thriving and demonstrating success in a remote or hybrid work environment.       Creativity:    A knack for developing innovative campaign ideas and concepts that stand out in the crowded influencer marketing space.       moCal Industry Knowledge:    Understanding of the relevant industry for moCal (technology, health, business, etc.) and the target audience the brand serves.       Educational Background:    Bachelors degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.                   Deep Understanding of moCals Brand:    A thorough knowledge of moCals target audience, brand voice, messaging, and overall marketing goals is paramount. This enables the manager to select influencers and shape campaigns that authentically resonate.       Social Media Savvy:    Mastery of the major social platforms (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, etc.), including their algorithms, best practices, and the nuances of influencer engagement on each.       Influencer Identification & Relationship Building:    The ability to proactively find the    right   influencers who align with moCals values and audience. It also requires nurturing strong, mutually beneficial relationships with these influencers.       Strategic Campaign Planning:    Crafting comprehensive influencer campaigns that ladder up to broader marketing goals, with clear objectives, timelines, and defined KPIs.       Creative Content Ideation:    Collaborating with influencers to develop engaging, on-brand content that will perform well with the target audience. This needs a dose of creativity and an understanding of what works on each platform.       Data-Driven Analysis:    Interpreting campaign metrics (reach, engagement, conversions, etc.) to measure success, extract insights, and optimize future strategies.       Negotiation & Contract Management:    Demonstrated skills in negotiating fair partnerships with influencers, handling contracts, and ensuring all terms are mutually advantageous.       Cross-Team Collaboration:    Working effectively with social media, creative, PR, and other teams to create holistic, integrated campaigns that maximize impact.       Proactive Trend Spotting:    Constantly monitoring the influencer marketing landscape to identify emerging trends, new platforms, and innovative opportunities to propel the moCal brand forward.       Excellent Communication & Interpersonal Skills:    Building trust with influencers, communicating clearly with internal teams, and fostering a positive collaborative environment are essential.

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Event Marketing Manager to join our dynamic marketing team at Kiya.ai. Association Memberships and Industry Engagement   : Manage Kiya.ai s memberships in relevant industry associations to enhance our network and visibility within the industry. Conceptualise and execute, post necessary management approvals    the creation of digital assets for Kiya.ai brand and products for example, product explainer videos, brand video, catalogues, brochures, etc.       Video Production and Editing Skills   : Proficient in video editing and production, with the ability to create compelling and informative demo videos. Experience with video editing software and a keen eye for visual storytelling are essential for developing high-quality content that effectively demonstrates Kiya.ai s products and services.       Vendor Relations   : Build and maintain relationships with event organizers, vendors, and other external partners.       Internal Coordination   : Liaise with internal departments such as Finance, Sales, Legal, and other marketing teams to secure necessary approvals and budgets for events.       Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)   : Develop and regularly update SOPs for event participation, ensuring that best practices are documented and consistently followed.     Create and implement training modules to enhance team members skills in event management and on-ground marketing.                     Minimum Qualification:                    Bachelor s degree in marketing, Business Administration, or a related field       A minimum of 5 years of experience in event management, marketing, or a similar role within a corporate setting     Demonstrated success in executing large-scale events, preferably in the tech or financial sector     Experience in digital marketing, including the creation of digital assets such as explainer videos and brochures     Familiarity with CRM and event management software     Excellent project management and team leadership abilities     Ability to travel as required for event participation and management

Budget Management:            Develop and manage marketing budgets, ensuring effective resource allocation to achieve desired outcomes and ROI. Team Leadership and Collaboration:            Lead and mentor a team of marketing professionals, offering guidance, support, and feedback to enhance individual and team performance. Campaign Performance Evaluation:            Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, utilizing metrics such as ROI, conversion rates, lead generation, website traffic, and engagement metrics. column2: Corporate Role | Reports into CEO About the Role Our partner schools and their students are our key stakeholders. These schools are across key Indian cities. We want to channelize GTM to these schools by building relevant sourcing channels (digital, events, referral and partnerships). At some point in this year, these channels should start delivering regular interests from schools and thus facilitate the sales journey. In addition, we want to establish the brand BeyondSkool in the minds of school management and parents - We want to build a series of events to meaningfully engage with them and also deliver on our brand promise of upskilling. We plan to do this by launching a marquee event property which can bring major schools and students under one umbrella to compete and showcase their skills. BeyondSkool also aims to build a unique networking platform for teachers and principals through a series of closed-door events. Hence, our ideal candidate will help us create lead-accretive channels, manage customer acquisition growth and cost, also build and deliver brand pull events (will be provided with a team). Last but not least, the promise of our curriculum holds true when we build it in conjunction with the best academic institutions of the world. Our ideal candidate will spearhead the exciting responsibility of liaising, pitching, and converting esteemed global academic brands as a curriculum partner for BeyondSkool. You will be leading all Marketing initiatives and working closely with the founder.   What you will do: Channel strategy & delivery: ??Pilot key sourcing channels relevant in attracting school management and build a constant pipeline for sales team  ??Build the user experience and retargeting funnel to engage with schools in our pipeline  ??Institutionalize target and calendar led approach towards channel contribution to sales Event Conceptualization and Organization: ??Lead the conceptualization, planning, and execution of marquee events aimed at enhancing our brand visibility and promoting our upskilling programs ??Oversee all aspects of event logistics, including venue selection, budget management, vendor coordination, and on-site execution   Networking Meet-ups for Teachers and Principals:  ??Organize networking meet-ups for teachers and principals from partner schools to facilitate knowledge sharing, professional development, and relationship building.  ??Curate engaging agendas and activities for the meet-ups to address the specific needs and  interests of educators in the field of communication, financial literacy, coding, AI etc. Strategic Partnerships Development: ??Lead the identification and cultivation of strategic partnerships with education brands and organizations to boost our product offering in the future. ??Negotiate partnership agreements and collaborate with internal teams to leverage resources and expertise for mutual benefit. In   a   nutshell,   all   marketing   initiatives   (customer   acquisition   or   brand)   will   come   under   your purview   with   both   the   authority   and   responsibility   to   strategize   and   deliver. What you will need ??Proven experience in event management, with a track record of successfully organizing large- scale events or conferences ??Past experience in having worked in the academic ecosystem is a preference ??In addition should have exposure to sourcing tools such as digital ads, referral, ATL ??Strong project management skills, including the ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and meet  deadlines under pressure ??Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport and influence stakeholders at all levels ??Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a keen understanding of the school landscape in India ??MBA with 3-5 years of relevant experience in marketing, channel-led lead sourcing (B2B with schools is a preference), event planning, execution & strategic partnerships What you will get ??Industry best perks (ESOPs can be discussed) ??Opportunity to represent the brand on-ground across key Indian cities ??Be a part of the core team that drives the growth of the company ??Phenomenal work environment, with massive ownership and great growth opportunities Join   us   in   shaping   the   future   of   education   and   empowering   students   with essential   skills   for   success! Location: Mumbai with event-related travel to other cities

column2: As India Human and Consumer Insights Associate Manager, you will lead CI projects for global as we'll as local customers in India, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka      You will identify learning needs with Commercial and Creative teams to help deliver on business objectives      You will define, execute & report consumer research, both qualitative & quantitative, to drive innovation and develop superior fragrances that consumers love      The role is Mumbai based and will report to Senior CI Manager, Asia          How You Will Contribute          Lead Consumer Research Design by defining the approach to deliver against learning needs or customer validation requirements in collaboration with Commercial and Scent Design teams. Present as we'll as develop materials incorporating study findings / insights / recommendations for internal team debriefs and customer meetings, workshops or events.          Engage and liaise with external research agencies for study proposals, negotiation, project briefing, fieldwork quality and deliverables. Support / Collaborate with the regional and global CI teams to execute projects in India.          Support the regional CI team, as and when required, on projects outside of the Indian subcontinent.          Essential Skills          masters or bachelors Degree in Market Research, Business, Statistics, Psychology, Behavioral Sciences or any other relevant discipline.          Expertise in Quantitative design, research methodology and data analysis.          we'll versed with statistical treatment of data with strong analytical software skills (SPSS / JMP / XLSTAT). Team player with excellent communication & presentation skills, with the ability to translate research data into actionable insights for the business.          Proficient in Microsoft Office applications (Powerpoint, Excel and Word).          Self-starter who can prioritize and manage deadlines and is solution driven.          Meticulous and pays attention to detail.          Fluent in English (written and verbal).          Willing to travel within and outside the Indian subcontinent as needed.          Essential Experience          Minimum 8 - 12 years of 360 project management / work experience in market research at the agency or the client side, preferably in the Fragrance or FMCG sector.          Track record in leading research design & methodology, executing and reporting for projects.          Ability to think beyond traditional testing methods; passionate in finding creative ways to test and connect with consumers. column2: Salesforce is seeking an experienced, we'll-rounded, and results-focused marketing professional who is ready to drive the Account Based Marketing (ABM) strategy and programs for India, as part of an all-star marketing team in Asia Pacific      The ideal candidate will be a dynamic, creative, collaborative, assertive and self-starting, with a passion for creating and delivering amazing marketing campaigns that drive outstanding pipeline, revenue, relationship and reputational results for our top accounts        The Account-Based Marketing Manager, India, will be part of an Asia Pacific team of ABMers who drive ABM across the Asia Pacific region including Australia, New Zealand, ASEAN and India      This role will be responsible for developing and executing strategic personalised marketing strategies and customer journeys focused on deepening relationships and strengthening Salesforce reputation, to effectively drive pipeline, revenue and growth within our most valuable accounts        This role requires a deep understanding of how to target senior decision makers within B2B accounts, collaborate with sales teams, sales leaders and marketing colleagues, leveraging data and analytics, and creating highly personalised marketing campaigns to drive revenue and customer retention              Key Responsibilities        :                Account Selection and Prioritisation:        Work with sales and marketing teams to identify and prioritise high value target accounts based on criteria such as revenue potential, industry, and business fit.              Account Identification & Segmentation:    Conduct internal and external research to identify and profile potential target accounts aligned with business objectives.    Utilize data and insights to segment accounts based on industry, size, customer need and behaviour.      .              Customer Insights:      Conduct external and internal research, and leverage data to understand the unique needs, challenges, preferences and goals of each account,      leveraging data and market intelligence to inform personalised and effective marketing strategies.      Work with sales teams and leverage external sources to identify key decision-makers, influencers, and pain points within each target account. Regularly communicate insights to sales and marketing colleagues, to ensure a unified and coordinated approach in engaging target accounts.                Strategy Development:        Develop and implement account-specific marketing strategies and journeys that are based on customer insights and align with the customer needs and overall business objectives. The strategies should engage and inspire key stakeholders within target accounts, building relationships and trust, and driving pipeline and revenue.                Personalised Campaigns:        Develop and execute highly customised account-specific marketing journeys, utilising account insights, delivered through relevant channels such as events, email, digital, web, direct mail, and webinars. Deliver experiments and innovation via a broad range of relevant mediums and channels, making them globally visible and available. The role includes hands-on execution with the day-to-day coordination and program management of all aspects of the initiatives and campaigns.              Digital Experiences:      Utilise real-time insights to create personalised and targeted digital experiences as part of account-specific journeys and campaigns, to engage and nurture target accounts. Collaborate with marketing colleagues to align digital initiatives with customer needs through various channels - including website, email, social media, and content.                Content Development:        Founded in insights, create, leverage, tailor and personalise relevant marketing content, including emails, case studies, social and other collateral, to resonate with target accounts.                Alignment with Sales:        Collaborate closely with the sales team to source insights, ensure marketing efforts align with their customer needs, their account strategies and objectives.                Marketing Collaboration:        actively collaborate with various parts of marketing locally and globally to maximise customer engagement and impact, ensure the ABM strategy and customer journeys are leveraging all the relevant marketing programs including strategic events, executive engagement, executive briefings, buyer marketing, digital, customer and content.                Measurement and Reporting:        Monitor and analyse the performance of ABM campaigns and top account segment. Leverage available dashboards and feedback mechanisms to provide regular updates on the progress and impact of ABM campaigns. Key performance indicators (KPIs) will align to revenue, reputation and relationship goals, as we'll as sourced, influenced and matured pipeline. Make data-driven decisions and consider sales feedback for optimisation and evolution of the programs.                Agencies:        effectively partner and manage appropriate marketing agencies to access specialised ABM skills and resources for insights, strategy, messaging, personalised content experiences and multi-channel campaigns. Work with these agencies to plan and execute innovative and impactful programs at scale on time and on budget                Budget Management:        Manage the budget allocated for ABM India initiatives, ensuring the ABM activities are executed within the defined budget.                    Competencies                Highly professional, dynamic, innovative, positive and resilient team player who takes initiative and has a can-do attitude.              Strong experience and references partnering with sales              Strong stakeholder management: ensure stakeholders needs, concerns, and expectations are considered and addressed appropriately to achieve success. Maintain positive relationships, whilst also being assertive to express own points of view that may differ to the stakeholder.    Set and manage stakeholder expectations regarding priorities, outcomes, timelines, and potential risks. Actively seek feedback from stakeholders and use it to prioritise and refine plans and actions. Address concerns and suggestions in a timely and professional manner.            Ability to adapt to change and thrive in a dynamic,      fast-paced environment. Must be very comfortable with continuously changing opportunities and priorities, with an appetite to innovate.            The ability to build trust, value others, communicate effectively, collaborate with others, drive execution, foster innovation, focus on delivery to customers, solve problems creatively and demonstrate high integrity            Communicating with impact - excellent verbal and written communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. Interacts with all levels of management.              Creativity and proven track record to develop and execute personalised B2B marketing strategies and campaigns with close alignment to sales and though several stages of the pipeline funnel across web, social, email, as we'll as in-person and virtual events and other activities.              Experience driving quantifiable ROI.              Data-driven mindset with the ability to use analytics to inform marketing decisions -    understand and optimise campaigns to increase engagement, lead quality, conversion rates, program performance and the effectiveness of marketing spend.          Understanding and experience with the latest digital technology for personalisation    through various channels, including website, email, social media, and content              Demonstrates high degrees of personal responsibility without disempowering others. Is able to manage the quantity and quality of work and expectations in its delivery.              Organised and detail-oriented, with strong project management skills to confidently lead multiple projects simultaneously across cross functional teams and agencies.              Self-starter. Can work independently or collaboratively to optimise business and team outcomes.                  Key Qualifications              7+ years proven experience in B2B marketing in a marketing manager and/or campaign manager capacity              7+ years proven experience managing and developing integrated marketing campaigns that engage sales teams and enhance relationships and reputation with their customers, whilst also driving demand, pipeline, and revenue.              2 years + in B2B Account Based Marketing preferred            3 years+ working with India customers and internal stakeholders

column2: We are seeking a talented and experienced Marketing Manager to join our team        As a Marketing Manager for our AI SaaS products, you will be responsible for overseeing branding communications and implementing various marketing strategies, including digital marketing, email marketing, social media marketing, LinkedIn marketing, website marketing, SEO, SEM, and more      Your role will be instrumental in driving brand awareness, generating leads, and achieving marketing objectives for our innovative AI-driven pricing solutions               Job Responsibilities            Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to promote our AI SaaS products for dynamic pricing, ensuring brand consistency and market positioning.              Oversee and coordinate branding communications, including messaging, visual identity, and tone of voice, to create a compelling and cohesive brand image.              Plan, execute, and optimize digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including email marketing, social media marketing, LinkedIn marketing, and website marketing.              Collaborate with the content team to create engaging and informative content that resonates with our target audience, including blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, and more.              Implement effective SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and increase website traffic, ensuring visibility and discoverability of our products and solutions.              Manage paid advertising campaigns, including search engine marketing (SEM), display advertising, and retargeting, to drive qualified traffic and generate leads.              Monitor and analyze marketing metrics, including website traffic, conversion rates, and campaign performance, to make data-driven decisions and optimize marketing initiatives.              Collaborate with the sales team to develop marketing collateral, sales enablement materials, and presentations that effectively communicate the value proposition of our AI SaaS products.              Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competitive landscape, and emerging technologies in AI and dynamic pricing, incorporating relevant insights into marketing strategies. column2: Brand Strategy    : Develop and execute a comprehensive brand strategy to establish and enhance the companys brand identity. Conduct market research and analyze consumer insights to identify target audience, brand positioning, and competitive landscape. Define brand guidelines and ensure brand consistency across all marketing channels and materials.        Marketing Campaigns    : Plan, create, and implement marketing campaigns that align with the brand strategy and objectives. Develop campaign concepts, messaging, and creative assets. Coordinate with internal teams and external agencies to execute campaigns effectively. Monitor campaign performance and analyze results to optimize future marketing efforts.        Digital Marketing    : Drive the companys digital marketing initiatives, including website management, search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), social media marketing, email marketing, and content marketing. Develop strategies to improve online presence, increase website traffic, and generate leads. Stay updated with digital marketing trends and technologies to identify new opportunities.        Content Development    : Oversee the creation and management of compelling and relevant content across various channels and formats. This includes website content, blog posts, social media content, videos, infographics, and whitepapers. Ensure that content aligns with the brand voice, engages the target audience, and supports marketing objectives.        Market Research and Analysis    : Conduct market research to understand consumer behaviors, industry trends, and competitive landscape. Analyze market data, customer insights, and marketing metrics to identify opportunities and make data-driven marketing decisions. Monitor market trends and competitors to adapt marketing strategies accordingly.        Public Relations    : Manage the companys public relations activities to enhance brand reputation and increase media coverage. Develop and maintain relationships with media outlets, journalists, and influencers. Create press releases, media kits, and other PR materials. Coordinate media interviews and manage crisis communications when necessary.        Brand Collateral and Materials    : Oversee the development and production of brand collateral, marketing materials, and promotional items. This includes brochures, sales presentations, product packaging, advertising materials, and trade show displays. Ensure that all materials are consistent with the brand identity and effectively communicate key messages.                Budget Management    : Develop and manage the marketing budget, ensuring efficient allocation of resources and maximizing return on investment (ROI). Monitor expenses, track marketing spend, and report on budget performance. Make budget recommendations based on marketing goals and objectives.        Team Management    : Lead and manage a team of marketing professionals, including graphic designers, content writers, digital marketers, and marketing coordinators. Provide guidance, mentorship, and support to the team. Set performance goals, conduct performance evaluations, and identify opportunities for skill development.        Collaboration and Cross-functional Coordination    : Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as sales, product management, and operations, to align marketing strategies with overall business goals. Coordinate marketing activities with sales efforts to support lead generation and customer acquisition. Foster effective communication and collaboration between departments.          Preferred candidate profile      Experience    : At least 5-8 years of proven experience in a related field is required.        Education    : A bachelors degree in marketing, business administration, communications, or a related field is often required. Some organizations may prefer candidates with a masters degree or MBA in Agribusiness management, particularly for senior-level positions.        Marketing Experience    : Significant experience in marketing is typically required, preferably in a managerial or leadership capacity. Candidates should have a strong understanding of marketing principles, strategies, and best practices. Experience in brand management and marketing campaign development is highly valued.        Brand Management Expertise    : In-depth knowledge and experience in brand management is essential. Candidates should have a proven track record of developing and executing successful brand strategies. They should be familiar with brand positioning, brand guidelines, brand identity development, and maintaining brand consistency across various channels.        Digital Marketing Skills    : Proficiency in digital marketing is crucial for a Manager of Brand and Marketing in todays digital age. Candidates should have experience and knowledge of various digital marketing channels, including social media, content marketing, SEO, SEM, email marketing, and analytics. Familiarity with marketing automation tools and platforms is beneficial.        Market Research and Analysis    : Strong analytical skills and the ability to conduct market research and analyze data are important. Candidates should be able to interpret market trends, consumer insights, and marketing metrics to drive strategic decision-making. Competency in using market research tools and data analysis software is advantageous.        Creative Thinking and Communication    : Managers of Brand and Marketing should possess strong creative thinking and problem-solving skills. They should be able to develop innovative marketing strategies and campaigns that resonate with the target audience. Excellent verbal and written communication skills are essential for effectively conveying brand messages and collaborating with cross-functional teams.        Leadership and Team Management    : The ability to lead and manage a team is critical for this role. Candidates should have experience in mentoring, motivating, and guiding marketing professionals. Strong leadership, delegation, and project management skills are important for successful execution of marketing initiatives.        Strategic Thinking and Business Acumen    : Managers of Brand and Marketing need to have a strategic mindset and the ability to align marketing strategies with overall business objectives. They should understand the market dynamics, customer needs, and competitive landscape to make informed marketing decisions. Business acumen, financial literacy, and the ability to track marketing ROI are valuable.        Adaptability and Flexibility    : The marketing landscape is constantly evolving, so candidates should be adaptable and open to change. They should be willing to learn new marketing techniques, stay updated with industry trends, and adapt strategies accordingly.        Industry Knowledge    : Familiarity with the specific industry or sector in which the company operates is advantageous. Candidates with prior experience in the industry may have an advantage as they already possess knowledge of the market, customers, and competitors.

column2: The successful candidate will work with various stakeholders including global industry campaign development team, regional growth marketing teams, marketing operations and sales teams, to orchestrate industry campaigns across APAC. By using data insights, the successful candidate will work closely with respective teams (including digital media center and marketing operations) to test and optimize marketing content and traffic drivers to influence desired customer behavior.                                                              He/she must be able to work productively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment with limited supervision along with experience working with field sales and marketing teams to deliver integrated campaigns and initiatives through various channels.                                                                  The role requires strong collaboration skills across a dynamic cross section of a globally matrixed organization. This may require some flexibility in working hours to accommodate communication across multiple time zones.                                                                  The role requires excellent communication skills, planning, and project management, and the ability to refine and implement comprehensive integrated marketing programs.                                                                  It also requires strong attention to detail, managing multiple priorities, an understanding of digital, data and experience with demand generation campaigns will be critical to success.                                                                  In addition to the above, there is a requirement for the candidate to extract, analyze and critically assess areas for investment and divestment across the business and campaign activities.                                                                  Critical thinking skills will be highly regarded.                                                                   Responsibilities                                      Define and execute on the marketing strategy and marketing mix for the 1: Many industry campaigns in APAC, as per the WWM (Worldwide Marketing) Integrated Marketing Plan         Leads the planning process for APAC, working closely with the GDC (Global Demand Center) center of excellence and industry campaign development team         Collaborate with extended stakeholders such as sales, partner marketing, and industry teams to ensure alignment on GTM (Go to Market) strategy. column2: Job Description:   We are seeking a dynamic and highly organized Event Manager or head to oversee and coordinate cultural programs, events, and initiatives within our organization. Event Manager will play a key role in promoting cultural awareness, engagement, and appreciation among our stakeholders. This position requires a creative and strategic thinker who is passionate about arts, heritage, and cultural diversity.   Responsibilities:     Develop and implement cultural programs and activities that align with the University mission and objectives.   Collaborate with internal teams, artists, cultural organizations, and community partners to plan and execute events, exhibitions, performances, and workshops.   Manage budgets, resources, and timelines for cultural projects, ensuring efficient use of resources and adherence to deadlines.   Coordinate marketing and promotional efforts to raise awareness and attract audiences to cultural events and initiatives.   Cultivate relationships with sponsors, donors, and funding agencies to secure financial support for cultural projects and programs.   Evaluate the impact and effectiveness of cultural initiatives through audience feedback, surveys, and other evaluation methods.   Stay informed about trends and developments in the cultural sector, including new artistic practices, emerging artists, and funding opportunities.   Advocate for diversity, equity, and inclusion in cultural programming and ensure representation of diverse perspectives and voices.   Provide leadership and support to staff and volunteers involved in cultural activities, fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment.   Represent the organization in cultural forums, conferences, and networking events, building partnerships and promoting the organization's cultural initiatives.     Qualifications:     Bachelor's degree   Proven 5 yrs experience in cultural programming, event planning, or arts management.   Strong project management skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively.   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with diverse stakeholders.   Familiarity with marketing and promotional strategies for cultural events.   Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite and other relevant software applications.   Ability to work evenings, weekends, and irregular hours as needed for events and activities.     Call at 8146651512

column2: As our Growth Onboarding Manager for the Videeo for Shopify product, you will be responsible for creating, optimizing and managing a scalable onboarding process for our customers in order to enhance customer adoption and satisfaction.      This role requires coordination and effective communication with multiple cross-functional teams while managing project timelines, all while ensuring customers have a successful and positive onboarding experience.      This position plays a key role in driving customer retention, product adoption, and long-term client success.      The role reports to our SVP of Marketing & Operations and is a fully remote position based in India with occasional travel. Preferably this person is based out of Mumbai or Bangalore.          Main Responsibilities          Lead, manage and develop employees on the Onboarding team      Develop and implement a comprehensive, scalable onboarding strategy and work with Product & Engineer to enhance the overall customer experience, increasing customer retention and product adoption      Analyze and assess the end to end customer journey, identifying key touchpoints and potential friction points      Develop key strategies and motions to reduce friction points, drive retention and upsell to higher priced packages      Design and optimize onboarding processes and customer journey post sign-up to ensure that clients can effortlessly navigate and adopt our platform without the need for human intervention      Develop and execute optimization plans to continuously improve customer journey (via experimentation and AB testing) from sign-up to product utilization, ensuring a continuous cycle of testing and optimization      Develop and deliver educational content, tutorials, and resources to empower customers to self-serve and find value in the product independently.      Stay informed about industry best practices and emerging trends to incorporate into onboarding strategies.      Ability to successfully communicate and collaborate with multiple different departments and segments of the company      Conduct webinars and demos for customers          Qualifications & Skills          At least 3-5+ years of proven experience building scalable velocity motion customer onboarding cycles and product led growth in a SaaS environment; preferably e-commerce      Significant experience working at the intersection of marketing, product management, design, and customer success.      Strong understanding of the nuances of showing how a feature works vs teaching someone to use that feature      Proven ability to lead, manage and develop a team      Strong understanding of the Shopify platform and e-commerce processes a plus      Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.      Analytical mindset with the ability to leverage data to drive decisions.      Strong inquisitive skills combined with excellent time management and prioritization capabilities      Ability to direct work with a bias towards action      Extremely strong written and verbal communication skills      Relevant industry experience in online retail and social commerce      Strong project management and organizational skills      Experience with ecommerce and understanding of the complete order lifecycle is a plus.      Experience with live selling, even as a consumer is a plus.      Social media marketing experience and understanding customer acquisition and retention channels/strategies is a plus.      Must be able to flex at least 4 working hours to overlap with North American timezones; Requirement to work until 3pm EST (US).

Craft compelling and clear positioning and messaging that positions our solutions and platform effectively in the healthcare marketing landscape in a way that resonates with healthcare professionals and pharmaceutical brands.           Market Research: Conduct in-depth market research to identify emerging trends, customer needs, and competitive insights. Use this research to guide product development and marketing strategies.         Go-to-Market Strategy: Partner closely with Product Marketing leadership to collaborate with cross-functional teams to create go-to-market strategies for new product launches, feature releases, and enhancements, ensuring successful rollout and adoption.         Content Creation: Produce high-impact marketing collateral centered on our products including product documentation, implementation guides, and FAQs. Collaborate with other members of the Marketing team on the creation and maintenance of product-related collateral including commercial materials, whitepapers, case studies, data sheets, videos, webinars, and site content, that effectively communicate product value.         Product Expertise: Work closely with the commercial teams to provide the tools and knowledge necessary to sell the products successfully. Partner with training other members of the Marketing team to develop and deliver product training for sales representatives.         Customer Insights: Gather and analyze feedback from customers to identify areas for improvement and innovation. Use customer insights to guide product enhancements and roadmap decisions.         Competitive Landscape: Monitor and assess the competitive landscape to identify opportunities for differentiation and market leadership.         Cross-functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with the Product team to ensure alignment between product capabilities and market needs.         Sales Support: Provide ongoing support to the sales team, including helping them address customer inquiries and objections about our products, participating in sales presentations when necessary.         Product Launches & Process: In close partnership with Product Marketing leadership, collaborate with Product, commercial teams, and your peers in Marketing to plan and execute product launches, including defining target audiences, messaging, and marketing campaigns. Implement, evolve, and enforce processes associated with best-in-class product launch cycles. Innovative and creative thinking, with a focus on problem-solving and driving product success.         Collaborative team player with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams. column2: As an Event Manager in our event management company, this role will be responsible for planning, organizing, and executing a wide range of events, including corporate conferences, trade shows, product launches, weddings, and social gatherings     Working closely with clients, vendors, and internal teams, will oversee all aspects of event coordination, from conceptualization and budgeting to on-site management and post-event evaluation     This role will involve managing multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring seamless execution, and delivering exceptional experiences that exceed client expectations and achieve desired outcomes           Key Responsibilities:         1. Collaborate with clients to understand their event objectives, preferences, and budgetary constraints, and develop customized event proposals and concepts to meet their need.     2. Plan and manage all logistical aspects of events, including venue selection, catering, audiovisual requirements, transportation, accommodations, and staffing..     3. Coordinate with vendors, suppliers, and contractors to negotiate contracts, obtain quotes, and secure services and equipment within budgetary constraints.     4. Develop detailed event timelines, schedules, and production plans, and oversee the execution of each phase of the event to ensure smooth operations and timely delivery.     5. Lead and supervise event staff, including coordinators, volunteers, and temporary personnel, and provide clear direction and support to ensure effective teamwork and task completion.     6. Conduct site inspections and walkthroughs at event venues to assess layout, logistics, and technical requirements, and address any operational or safety concerns.     7. Oversee event setup, d cor, signage, and branding elements, and ensure that all design elements align with the client s vision and brand guidelines.     8. Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, vendors, and stakeholders throughout the event planning process, and proactively address any issues or challenges as they arise.     9. Conduct post-event evaluations, gather feedback from clients and attendees, and analyze event performance to identify strengths, weaknesses, and areas for improvement.                 Qualifications:       1. Bachelors degree in event management, marketing, or a related field.     2. Proven experience working as an event manager or coordinator, preferably in the event management industry or a related field.     3. Strong project management skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize tasks effectively to meet deadlines.     4. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with clients, vendors, and team members and negotiate contracts and agreements.     5. Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a proactive approach to identifying opportunities for innovation and improvement.     6. Strong attention to detail and organizational skills, with the ability to plan, execute, and evaluate events meticulously.     7. column2: OVERVIEW        The Digital Campaign Manager will not only translate product priorities and campaigns into go to market plans but will act as the internal voice of the customer.      This individual will understand customer needs and motivations and make sure our activities and campaigns add value to every stage of the buyer journey.      The Demand Gen Manager will be an expert on buyer persona and motivations while delivering on the customer centric promise.      This is not about guesswork; we will work to integrate real-time data into every decision, always striving to do a better job.      The right person will think beyond leads and will be able to build and execute marketing programs that drive awareness, fandom and consideration among our buyers and learners.      The Demand Gen Manager will be comfortable with both strategy and execution. As an executional strategist, you will understand the overarching strategy while also being forensic when something goes wrong and be accountable and able to fix and improve.        OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS          Plan and execute digital lead gen strategy and end-to-end campaigns that clearly demonstrate and articulate the value of SumTotal s solutions and achieve business objectives.          Collaborate with marketing operations, content, product marketing, and other departments to deploy, optimize, and iterate campaigns across global market.          Identify and execute the right combination of channels and formats designed to engage our buyers and learners (i.e. social media, PPC, content syndication, paid media, email marketing, webinars, video).          Design and execute a lead nurture strategy that generates sales opportunities, reengages previous leads, and helps to accelerate opportunities through the pipeline.          Manage relationships and timelines with digital advertising vendors and internal stakeholders to gather, prepare, and deliver full funnel marketing campaigns          Regularly present digital marketing performance to internal stakeholders in understandable language to set and manage expectations regarding goal performance.          Pull and analyze key reporting data to ensure continual learning and optimization within digital marketing tactics.          Build and manage a tight relationship with sales, forging strong communication between teams.          Be the digital expert for the business unit. Always stay aware of future opportunities and be able to evaluate their usefulness for the SumTotal business.          SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS          BA/BS degree or equivalent experience          7+ years of digital marketing with proven experience in identifying winning campaigns to connect with identified buyer personas with precision and replicability          Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple projects          Strong interpersonal, verbal, and written skills with the ability to communicate digital strategy and plans to executives throughout the business          Demonstrated critical thinking and ability to navigate obstacles, resolve issues, and effectively advocate for the demand gen team to capitalize on open opportunities.          Experience with a range of MarTech and analytics tools (Our stack includes Marketo, Salesforce, Google Analytics, Craft)          Strong knowledge of reporting and analysis within CRM (Salesforce) to inform campaign strategy in order to achieve KPIs          Experience with managing quarterly and annual budgets          Ability to collaborate with product marketing, content marketing, and public relations to generate clear messaging and drive tangible impact          Strong understanding of the marketing funnel and what influences success across the funnel          Excellent analytical skills and ability to aggregate data from multiple sources to make educated decisions on campaign optimization and spend across all marketing channels          Ability to be an amazing partner to the product team and create, communicate, and present marketing plans & budgets, progress, and results          Record of success in driving growth on a fast-moving team with multiple concurrent projects          A can-do attitude and a willingness to roll up your sleeves as part of the team

column2: Nature of Job    Remote      Inbound Marketing Specialists at Lone Fir Creative are hands-on production positions where you will deliver digital and inbound marketing services while you acquire the necessary skills and experience to advance to the level of a Digital Marketing Strategist.     We re looking for highly organized, responsible, accountable and driven marketers who want to be a long-term, respected contributor to our team. You ll combine your existing skills and a great collaborative environment into success in an exploding market for digital marketing, analytics, and marketing automation. You will be challenged every day and you will develop the skills and track record that you can be proud of!       POSITION OVERVIEW       You will work hand-in-hand with a Digital Marketing Strategist to create top-notch digital and inbound marketing programs for our growing set of clients. This means you ll gain valuable experience in the strategy behind digital and inbound marketing, and grow your skills as a marketer. At the same time, you ll take the leadership position in executing these plans to exceed Client expectations on schedule and on budget. You will quickly become a Inbound Marketing guru and will spend part of your time ensuring you stay up to speed and utilize the newest tools.     NOTE: this IS a remote position.       THE DAY-TO-DAY         A strong understanding of marketing and content development in order to help our clients clarify their message and convert leads into customers along their buying journey.     Sharpen your skills in digital and inbound marketing tactics including blogging, social media marketing, search engine optimization, e-book/white paper/video content creation, website updates, email marketing, and others     Become a HubSpot and Lone Fir Creative process ninja and keep up with software updates and best practices, educating yourself and teammates as required.     Collaborate with Digital Marketing Strategists to create monthly performance reports and dashboards that provide deep data-driven insights about customer needs and behaviors to fuel innovation, and to identify strategic initiatives that will drive sales, growth, and profitability     Collaborate with Digital Marketing Strategists on on-going strategic programs for our clients     Seek to learn and stay up to date with the best software, marketing tools, and analytics software.     Stay informed about digital and inbound marketing industry developments     Become the resident expert on your client s industry and marketing     Contribute to client content development.     Practice your craft by contributing to Lone Fir Creative s blog and social media presence     Other responsibilities as assigned         MORE ABOUT YOU         Highly organized! Detail oriented and is bothered when things fall through the cracks - your agenda/timeline skills are organized to a T      A leader, through and through. You are very comfortable pitching and defending your work to strangers and longtime acquaintances.     A strong ability to think on your feet and seek to find answers when they are immediately unclear     Great vibe and culture fit. It s important for you to fit in with our company and what we re aiming to achieve together     Exudes our core values (Hungry but Humble, go after Excellence, create Value for the customers we Serve, Own life when possible, and Never Stop Learning)     Fully participate in our project management system     Constantly recommend adjustments to our process to improve flow, production, client results, and client satisfaction.         BONUS FOR         Marketing experience     Writing experience     Experience with the StoryBrand framework     Technical experience (setting up and changing domains, connecting integrations, basic website changes, and updates)     Comfort and familiarity in popular software including but not limited to: HubSpot, Asana, Slack, Google Apps, and any other marketing and email automation software.         HERE S WHAT WE OFFER         Remotely flexible and hours.     All the right tools for the job.     Opportunity to grow fast and be a part of something from the ground up     Health Coverage / Benefits     Paid time-off

column2: Overview The CANADA Digital Marketing Analyst will own all performance marketing on retailers websites (ie: programmatic search, paid search media on retailers platforms), such as Amazon, Instacart, Loblaw (PCX), Criteo (WM, Metro, Costco, Uber Eats), and Citrus Ads (SOF). This role will set up campaigns, execute the campaigns, provide post analysis by period, and retrospectives on what is working and what is not working. This role will be critical for guiding the team on how they should focus their A&M $ for the upcoming period, quarter and full year to unlock incremental growth. This requires paid search expertise on site, and a strong understanding of how to best optimize search, how to set up bidding campaigns, digital strategies, campaign planning.  This position will also be required to provide feedback to external retailers on how they can improve their search portal and to the global pepsiCo team on tools they are bringing forward. This position is a fundamental team member for the Canadian eCommerce business and is required to LEAD discussions on how we can drive further growth from the A&M $ we have to spend. This position will report into Associate Director CME at HBS and will be based out of Hyderabad. Since this position manages external markets, the person will need to work compliant to Eastern Standard Time Zones (ie: NY time zone).  Responsibilities Responsible for all performance marketing (paid search on retailers site) ~ Loblaws, Amazon, Instacart (WM, Loblaws, Metro, Costco, Longos), Criteo (WM, Costco, Metro, Uber Eats), Citrus Ads (Save on Foods).  Analyze campaign performance against key metrics to identify, recommend, and implement optimizations to increase efficiency, drive high-performing search campaigns to generate high ROAS.  Monitor and communicate campaign progress through regular, in-depth activity reports and insights, using this knowledge as a basis for future campaigns with high on-platform search rankings.  Consult and educate eCommerce National Account Managers with insights and solutions to achieve greater results on various ecommerce platforms Digitally savy, and have strong understanding of winning strategies of campaign search on retailers sites (must understand key word bidding vs. brand biding).  Strong project management skills to impact process improvements  Must be able to manage multiple competing priorities, as they will be responsible for multiple platforms that this individual will have to toggle between, currently 6 platforms, however some aggregators span multiple customers so will be required to set up individual campaigns there as well).  Liaise with eCommerce Team (who owns some customers budgets) and build a business plan by customer. Troubleshoot any technical or implementation issues, collaborating with internal teams to develop quick and sound solutions  Serve as a source of market intelligence for input on how we can support improvement of retailers search programs and even global eCommerce tools (e.g., product development, product marketing, pricing) and assist in the development of best practices and operational efficiencies  Lead monthly post game reviews, and quarterly reviews with Sales & Marketing Teams Qualifications 3+ years of experience in digital marketing specific experience, programmatic search knowledge is a MUST.  Strong project/program management skills to drive process improvements and develop consistency in the services offered  Organizational skills and be can flex between competiting priorities, tight deadlines, and keeping the people and projects moving on schedule.  Aptitude to learn fast, to absorb and integrate new facts and methodologies  Good attention to detail and ability to spot potential problems and plan to avoid them in advance. Analytical, data-driven approach to problem-solving and a track record of driving results through continuous improvement  Embodies entrepreneurial mindset and key values of having a bias for action, results-oriented, community-focused, and prioritization of people.  Genuine, in possession of humility, honesty and integrityExcellent written and verbal communication skills, strong attention to detail, and good follow-through  Strong problem-solving capabilities - as evidenced by a track record of finding feasible solutions to complex problems, especially in an environment with incomplete information and tight timelines Sound communication skills - as evidenced by the ability to educate and influence internal and external staff Resilience - as evidenced by the courage to maintain a positive attitude when faced with obstacles and the willingness to develop alternative approaches to overcome them Bias for action - as evidenced by a track record of taking decisions in to drive the interests of the business while still maintaining highest levels of rigor and compliance

column2: About the Role   Cleartrip is seeking a dynamic and creative Brand Manager to spearhead our social media and content strategy, including YouTube and Instagram content creation, as well as collaboration with other brands to create buzz for the Cleartrip brand. As the Brand Manager, you will be responsible for crafting compelling narratives, engaging content, and innovative campaigns to elevate Cleartrip's brand presence across various digital platforms and drive strategic partnerships.   About Our Team:   Join a dynamic and innovative team at Cleartrip that has consistently delivered award-winning campaigns since the brand relaunch. As part of our team, you'll collaborate with passionate professionals who are dedicated to redefining travel experiences and shaping the future of the industry.   Key Highlights:       Award-Winning Campaigns: ?Our team has a track record of success, with multiple award-winning campaigns recognized for creativity, innovation, and impact in the travel sector.       Creative Excellence: ?We pride ourselves on pushing the boundaries of creativity and storytelling, creating captivating content that resonates with audiences and drives results.       Cross-Functional Collaboration: ?Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do. You'll work closely with talented individuals from marketing, design, product, and other teams to bring our vision to life and achieve our goals.       Innovation and Experimentation: ?We're constantly exploring new ideas, technologies, and strategies to stay ahead of the curve and deliver cutting-edge campaigns that captivate our audience and drive business growth.       Results-Driven Culture: ?Our team is focused on achieving tangible results and making a meaningful impact. From increasing brand awareness to driving customer engagement and loyalty, we're committed to delivering measurable outcomes that drive success for Cleartrip.       Continuous Learning and Growth: ?We believe in investing in our team members' growth and development. You'll have access to learning opportunities, mentorship, and resources to help you excel in your role and advance your career.       Join Our Team:   If you're passionate about travel, creative storytelling, and driving impactful campaigns, we'd love to have you on board! Join our award-winning team at Cleartrip and be part of a journey to redefine travel experiences for millions of users worldwide.   Key Responsibilities:     Develop and implement a comprehensive social media strategy to increase brand awareness, drive engagement, and foster community growth across platforms including YouTube and Instagram.   Create high-quality, original content for Cleartrip's YouTube channel and Instagram profile, ranging from travel guides and destination highlights to travel tips, vlogs, behind-the-scenes footage, and visually appealing Instagram posts.   Collaborate cross-functionally with marketing, design, and product teams to ensure brand consistency and alignment with business objectives across all content formats.   Manage Cleartrip's YouTube and Instagram content calendars, planning, scripting, and producing videos and posts to maintain a consistent and impactful presence on the platforms.   Monitor YouTube and Instagram analytics, track performance metrics, and leverage insights to optimize content strategy, improve engagement, and drive channel growth.   Cultivate relationships with travel influencers, content creators, and brand ambassadors to collaborate on YouTube and Instagram collaborations, amplify Cleartrip's message, and reach new audiences.   Identify strategic brand partnerships and collaborations with other travel-related and lifestyle brands to create buzz for the Cleartrip brand, increase visibility, and drive customer acquisition.   Negotiate and execute brand collaborations, co-branded content campaigns, and joint promotional initiatives to maximize brand exposure and generate buzz in the travel industry.   Stay updated on YouTube and Instagram trends, algorithm updates, and best practices for content creation and collaboration to continuously innovate and enhance Cleartrip's presence on the platforms.     ?   To succeed in this role ??you should have the following   ?     Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field; MBA preferred.   Proven experience (3+ years) in social media management, content creation, and digital marketing, with a focus on YouTube and Instagram content strategy, video production, and influencer collaboration.   Strong understanding of YouTube and Instagram platform dynamics, algorithms, and best practices for organic and paid content distribution, including SEO, metadata optimization, and audience targeting.   Creative mindset with a passion for storytelling, visual communication, and influencer marketing, demonstrated through a portfolio of engaging YouTube and Instagram content and successful brand collaborations.   Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret YouTube and Instagram analytics, track performance metrics, and derive actionable insights to optimize content strategy and achieve KPIs.   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate effectively across teams, negotiate partnerships, and influence stakeholders at all levels.   Self-motivated and results-oriented with a proactive approach to problem-solving, project management, and staying ahead of industry trends.
