column2: Marcom Manager        (      Job Number:          HOT0AL04    )          Work Locations      :          Hilton Garden Inn New Delhi / Saket Hotel            A4 DLF Place        Saket District Center            New Dehli        110117                        With thousands of hotels in over 100 countries and territories,  Hilton offers countless opportunities to delight.  From an open door to a welcoming smile and an exceptional experience,  we offer the millions of travellers who stay with us every year a welcome they will never forget.  In addition to our flagship brand,  Hilton Hotels & Resorts,  the family of brands includes Waldorf Astoria,  LXR,  Conrad,  Canopy,  Curio Collection,  DoubleTree,  Hilton Garden Inn,  Hampton and many others.               If you appreciate the impact global travel can have on the world,  you may be just the person we are looking for to work as a Hilton Team Member.  Because it s with Hilton where we never forget the reason we're here: to delight our guests,  Team Members,  and owners alike.               Position Statement:              The Marketing & Communications Manager is responsible for the promotion of the hotel,  its image,  facilities and services to the general public,  customers,  the hotel and the community.  He / she is also responsible for gaining positive exposure for the hotel in mass media and the community,  as well as building a solid presence in the market by maintaining good relationship with the press and the local community.                             Core Competencies:                    As the Marketing & Communications Manager,  you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards:                              Be familiar with hotel product knowledge and related activities.                               Responsible for the publicity and promotion of all products of the hotel,  including but not limited to rooms,  catering,  banquets,  etc.                               Assist the relevant departments to achieve the revenue targets and related tasks set by the hotel.                               Develop and implement the hotel's advertising budget and external advertising.                               Coordinate and implement communication plans for hotel activities and promotions (sales,  catering,  etc. ) with all operating departments of the hotel.                               Ensure that the hotel has a good image and corresponding flow on the mainstream platform in the main source area.                               Establish good relations with the media (publications,  broadcasts,  etc. ) and implement hotel marketing campaigns.                               Fully monitor all printed products of the hotel to ensure consistency with group guidelines.                               Ensure the hotel homepage,  official Website and other online and social media platforms  information is accurate and updated in a timely manner.                               Real-time monitoring of guest comments on various network platforms and replying promptly.                               Design prints according to hotel standards and ensure print quality.                               Manage a comprehensive targeted database and advertise hotel promotions.                               Monitor expenses according to the commercial development department budget to maximize return on investment.                               Liaise with other hotel departments,  outside organizations or government departments to coordinate and implement different hotel projects.                               Assist with photography,  video shooting and interviews of domestic and foreign media.                               Update the gallery and promotional kit in a timely manner to maintain a fixed capital list.                                 Manages a brand s online presence,  strategizing,  creating content,  and analyzing data for optimal engagement.                                   Work with corporate offices,  create ad-hoc emails,  guest communication emails and social media campaigns,  creating cross-promotional opportunities with third party sites                                  Efficiently utilize Hilton online tools.                                   Create cross-promotional opportunities with third party sites or sister properties.                                   Review and improve on the effectiveness of the initiatives.                                   Good administrative skills to get work done from creative and PR agencies.                                 Work closely with the digital marketing agency to produce optimum output with strong focus on building social media visibility via consistent growth in all aspects like growth,  engagement and reach rate.                                Maintain normal communication with the local media.                               Monitor the design project.                               Responsible for the management of the Marcom department.                               Carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.                                   What are we looking for?                A Marketing & Communications Manager serving Hilton Brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members.  To successfully fill this role,  you should maintain the attitude,  behaviours,  skills,  and values that follow:                                Hospitality          : We are passionate about delivering exceptional Guest experiences. column2: Events Manager        (      Job Number:          HOT0A8R1    )          Work Locations      :          Hilton Bangalore Embassy Manyata Business Park            Manyata Embassy Business Park,  Rachenahalli,  Nagawara,  Outer Ring Road,  Bangalore,  India                    Bangalore        560045                    With thousands of hotels in over 100 countries and territories,  Hilton offers countless opportunities to delight.  From an open door to a welcoming smile and an exceptional experience,  we offer the millions of travellers who stay with us every year a welcome they will never forget.  In addition to our flagship brand,  Hilton Hotels & Resorts,  the family of brands includes Waldorf Astoria,  LXR,  Conrad,  Canopy,  Curio Collection,  DoubleTree,  Hilton Garden Inn,  Hampton and many others.      If you appreciate the impact global travel can have on the world,  you may be just the person we are looking for to work as a Hilton Team Member.  Because it s with Hilton where we never forget the reason we're here: to delight our guests,  Team Members,  and owners alike.          The Events Manager is responsible for the successful handling of groups involving 10 or more guestrooms.  This role ensures effective communication with clients and efficient coordination with departments concerned,  under the general guidance and supervision of the Director of Banquet Sales,  maximizing business opportunities.            What will I be doing?       As the Events Manager,  you will be responsible for performing the following tasks to the highest standards:       Liaise closely with the Sales team in proposing the best deal when handling leads / inquiries (pricing strategy,  special requirements) passed over,  in order to convert the leads / inquiries to confirmed events.        Prepare proposals and contracts for leads,  addressing inquiries received from Sales Managers.        Follow through from negotiation until departure for events assigned.        Liaise with clients on finalizing details and give professional advice on set-ups and planning of events.        Practice up-selling at all opportunities to maximize revenue.        Ensure effective communication with clients and internal departments.        Responsible for the dissemination of groups related information to other departments e. g.  issues on banquet event orders and group resumes as well as chair pre-event meetings.        Maintain close coordination with respective departments on organizers  requirements and last-minute event requirements.        Be visible to organizers and clients during their event / group dates and monitor guest satisfaction.        Oversee the operation of banquet functions and work closely with various departments to ensure quality service is delivered to our clients at all times.        Regularly review master account postings to ensure postings are correctly done.        Review bills with organizers regularly so as to eliminate adjustments needed on final invoices.        Maintain close communication with concerned Sales Managers during the process.        Involve concerned Sales Managers during post-event meetings and post-event follow-ups such as sending thank you letters and post-event critique forms together.        Verify total charges and layout of invoices prepared by the Accounts team and send out to organizers.        Obtain feedback from clients and follow through with the necessary actions.        Refer leads and send event profile information to relevant sister hotels,  NSO / ISO (if any).        Maintain the active event profile database and group chart.        Establish and maintain files of major accounts,  assisting the Director of Banquet Sales in maintaining the accounts management system.        Establish good working relationships with internal customers (other departments of the hotel) and external customers (clients,  event contractors,  suppliers).        Actively participate in achieving departmental goals which contribute to marketing budget.        Closely monitor account revenue and business production.        Provide feedback on market trends and keep updated with client relationships and overall business goals through close communication with Banquet Sales Managers and the Director of Banquet Sales.        Assist the Director of Banquet Sales in the forecasting of group room nights and banquet revenue.        Arrange relationship building visitations when necessary.        Cross-sell other Hilton hotels.        Handle inquiries for re-booking of business and new leads when Sales Managers are not available.        Closely communicate with concerned Sales Managers regarding the progress of negotiation processes.        Conduct site inspections for potential clients when Banquet Sales Managers / Coordinators are not available.        Attend regular communication meetings with operations staff to update on event details.        Ensure effective and close communication within the department and other departments.        Maintain timely and responsive communication with clients.        Liaise with the Food & Beverage department in ensuring that the hotel hygiene and food safety control standards are maintained.        Always ensure that a hospitable service atmosphere is projected at all times in the hospitality business.        Carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.        The Management reserves the right to make changes to this job description at its sole discretion and without advance notice.                        What are we looking for?       An Events Manager serving Hilton Brands is always working on behalf of our Guests and working with other Team Members.  To successfully fill this role,  you should maintain the attitude,  behaviours,  skills,  and values that follow:       University graduate.        Minimum 3 years of experience in a similar capacity with international chain hotels.        Excellent command of written and spoken English and Chinese to meet business needs.        Good team player and able to manage by example.        Good communication,  interpersonal,  presentation and organizational skills.        Have hotel sales experience and hotel database.        Able to work under pressure and deal with stressful situations during busy periods.        Very familiar with local market and good at marketing trend analysis.            What will it be like to work for Hilton?       Hilton is the leading global hospitality company,  spanning the lodging sector from luxurious full-service hotels and resorts to extended-stay suites and mid-priced hotels.  For nearly a century,  Hilton has offered business and leisure travellers the finest in accommodations,  service,  amenities and value.  Hilton is dedicated to continuing its tradition of providing exceptional guest experiences across its global brands.  Our vision to fill the earth with the light and warmth of hospitality unites us as a team to create remarkable hospitality experiences around the world every day.  And,  our amazing Team Members are at the heart of it all!                     Job      :        Sales          Schedule      :        Full-time

column2: Job Title:  Sr. Marketing manager Experience:  10 - 15 years Location:  M.G Road, Agra Job Type:  Full-time Job Description: -  As a Senior Marketing Manager in our dynamic book publication house, you will play a pivotal role in driving the marketing strategies to enhance the visibility, engagement, and sales of our diverse book portfolio. This position requires a creative and strategic thinker with a deep understanding of the publishing industry, digital marketing trends, and a proven track record of successful book marketing campaigns. Responsibilities: 1. Book Launch and Promotion: Develop and execute comprehensive book launch strategies. Coordinate promotional campaigns to create maximum impact for new releases. 2. Author Collaboration: Build and maintain strong relationships with authors to enhance collaboration in marketing activities. Coordinate author participation in promotional campaigns. 3. Public Relations: Manage relationships with media outlets, bloggers, and influencers. Draft and distribute press releases and secure media coverage for key book releases. 4.Distribution Support: Work closely with the sales team to create effective marketing materials for book distribution. Implement marketing initiatives to strengthen relationships with distributors and retail partners. 5. Events and Promotions: Plan and execute promotional events, book signings, and author tours. Identify and leverage opportunities for participation in industry events and book fairs. 6. Market Research: Conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends and reader preferences. Analyze competitor activities and adjust marketing strategies accordingly. 7. Budget Management: Develop and manage the marketing budget efficiently. Monitor expenses and provide regular budget reports. 8. Data Analysis and Reporting: Utilize analytics tools to track and analyze marketing performance metrics. Prepare detailed reports on the success of marketing strategies. 9. Collaboration with Other Departments: Work closely with editorial, design, and sales teams to ensure integrated marketing efforts. Provide marketing support for new acquisitions and publications. 10. Customer Engagement: Implemment strategies to engage with readers and build a community around our books. Utilize CRM tools for effective customer relationship management. Qualifications: 1. Education:  Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or a related field. Masters degree is a plus. 2. Experience:  10-15 years of experience in book publishing or related industry. Proven track record of successful book marketing campaigns. 3. Digital Marketing Skills:  Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms. Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, and social media marketing. 4. Communication Skills:  Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to create compelling marketing materials. 5. Relationship Building:  Strong networking and relationship-building skills. Ability to collaborate effectively with authors and industry professionals. 6. Analytical Skills:  Strong analytical skills to interpret data and make data-driven decisions. Familiarity with analytics tools. 7. Creativity:  Creative thinking to develop innovative marketing strategies. Ability to differentiate books in a competitive market. 8. Leadership and Team Management:  Leadership skills to guide and manage a marketing team. Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional environment. Interested candidates can share their resume at  recruitment@oswaalbooks.com / hrlead@oswaalbooks.com

AGM Marketing is responsible for overseeing the planning, development and execution of a residential and commercial projects marketing and advertising initiatives. They play a vital role in a companys growth and have important responsibilities that range from creative influence to business strategy. Role:  AGM - Marketing Industry Type:  Real Estate Services Department:  Marketing & Communication Employment Type:  Full Time, Permanent Role Category:  Marketing ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES: 1. Developing Marketing Strategies: Create comprehensive marketing strategies to promote residential properties. Conduct market research to identify target demographics and trends. Analyse competitor marketing strategies and adjust plans accordingly. 2. Brand Management: Maintain and enhance the brand image of the residential properties. Ensure consistency in branding across all marketing channels. Develop and enforce brand guidelines for internal and external use. 3. Digital Marketing: Oversee digital marketing initiatives, including social media, email campaigns, and online advertising. Implement SEO and SEM strategies to enhance online visibility. Stay abreast of digital marketing trends and incorporate innovative approaches. 4. Traditional Marketing: Develop and execute traditional marketing campaigns, such as print ads, brochures, and direct mail. Collaborate with advertising agencies and media partners. Ensure alignment of traditional and digital marketing efforts. 5. Public Relations: Build and maintain relationships with key media outlets. Create and distribute press releases for significant property developments or events. Manage crisis communication effectively. 6. Event Management: Plan and execute events to showcase residential properties. Coordinate with event planners, vendors, and sponsors. Evaluate the success of events and adjust strategies accordingly. 7. Collaboration with Sales Teams: Work closely with the sales team to align marketing strategies with sales goals. Provide sales teams with necessary marketing materials and support. Analyze sales data and adjust marketing strategies as needed. 8. Budget Management: Develop and manage the marketing budget. Track expenses and ensure cost-effectiveness of marketing initiatives. Provide regular reports on the ROI of marketing campaigns. 9. Customer Relationship Management (CRM): Manage & coordinate CRM systems to track and analyze customer interactions. Develop targeted marketing campaigns based on CRM data. Enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty through strategic initiatives. 10. Market Trends and Innovation: Stay informed about market trends, industry innovations, and customer preferences. Integrate innovative marketing techniques to set the properties apart from the competition. Continuously assess and update marketing strategies based on market dynamics. 11. Team Leadership: Lead and mentor the marketing team. Foster a collaborative and creative work environment. Set clear goals and expectations for team members. 12. Compliance and Legal: Ensure all marketing activities comply with relevant laws and regulations. Work with legal teams to review and approve marketing materials. REQUIREMENTS: 8 to 10 years of experience in marketing out of which 4-5 years of marketing experience at Real estate and real estate service organization.  Along with a strong understanding of Brand, PR, and Communications, an ability to lead business marketing is a must. A successful track record of managing ATL BTL media, advertising campaign development, and new media management. A strong understanding of online media, digital channels, App website development is a key requirement. The right candidate will be a flexible, action results-oriented self-starter. She / He must be able to balance business aggression with strong functional expertise and partnering and influencing skills. Should have a strategic approach with the ability to see the "big picture" and interpret environmental and organizational changes and their impact on the organization. Excellent conceptual ability, communication presentation skills. EDUCATION  Graduate in relevant stream is must and / or MBA with Marketing specialization from good institute  ABOUT COMPANY: JUSTO is an innovative knowledge-driven real estate services company that facilitates developers across all aspects of the Design to Delivery product cycle.  Founded by professionals from the real estate and financial service industry, who design and develop customised delivery models that are instrumental in creating value for developers and clients. Built on the principles of Advice, Create and Nurture, Justo strikes a fine balance between technology with human interactions to effectively create Offline to Online delivery model.

column2: Job Role: Social Media Manager Job Type: Contractual, Remote We're looking for a Social Media Manager who can relate to their audience, who genuinely enjoys tracking online trends, loves variety, and demonstrates an uncanny ability to work with the team to make creative ideas into meaningful, relevant,  memorable (or humorous) content.  As the Social Media Manager, you're a digitally minded person who is creative, well organized, confident and willing to share your innovative ideas with the aim to increase engagement and communicate effectively. Social media channels: Meta (Facebook & Instagram), Linkedin, Youtube, TikTok, X Responsibilities : Develop a cohesive social media strategy that aligns with the companys business goals and brand identity. Knowledge of online marketing and a good understanding of major marketing channels. Positive attitude, detail and customer-oriented with good multitasking and organizational ability. Work Environment : This position operates remotely with a requirement that you have a work from home office set up that is professional and allows for uninterrupted working. Must be able to work under pressure and manage workloads effectively. Availability during weekends and evenings may be required for responding to critical social media engagements. Physical Requirements : Generally, this job requires sitting, using computers for extended periods, and interacting with other team members through online communication tools.

column2: Porter: Creating Impactful Journeys At Porter, we're not just passionate about improving productivity; we're on a vision to Moving a billion dreams one delivery at a time. We empower businesses, both large and small, to optimize their operations and unleash unprecedented growth in their core functions. Join us in pioneering the future of last-mile logistics, one that's poised to disrupt the industry and redefine the way we think about transportation. Why Porter? Industry Leadership: As the fastest-growing leader in last-mile logistics, we boast a Pan India presence with operations spanning multiple cities. With a fleet size exceeding 750k active driver partners and 15 million MAU. Porter is at the forefront of this dynamic and rapidly expanding sector. Cutting-Edge Technology: Our industry-best technology platform has garnered over $150 million in investments from renowned backers, including Sequoia Capital, Kae Capital, Mahindra Group, LGT Aspada, Tiger Global, and Vitruvian Partners. We leverage technology to drive efficiency, innovation, and unparalleled service. Ambitious: We're not just solving problems; we're addressing a massive challenge and going after a market with a valuation surpassing $50 billion USD. Our ambition extends beyond last-mile delivery; we aim to disrupt all facets of logistics, including warehousing and LTL transportation. Thriving Community: Join a community of passionate individuals who are committed to doing the best work of their lives. At Porter, we value the spirit of collaboration, innovation, and embracing challenges head-on. Be a Part of Something Extraordinary: If you're ready to make an impact, be at the forefront of innovation, and embrace the challenges and opportunities of a fast-paced work environment, Porter is the place for you. We're not just building a brand; we're creating a household name in transportation. Join us and be part of the revolution  where every day is an opportunity to redefine what's possible. If you are ready to make a significant impact and shape the future of Porter, apply now and be part of our exciting journey! https://porter.in/ Were looking for someone with excellent writing and research skills to be our full-time, in-house copywriter. Proven experience as a copywriter or related role for over 4 years Exceptional writing skills. Adaptability in writing style. column2: The seasoned APJ Staff Product Marketing Manager will play a pivotal role in spearheading our portfolio throughout the Asia-Pacific and Japan region. Their primary mission is to enhance our brand presence and drive sales growth. This entails collaborating with cross-functional teams and coordinating closely with colleagues in product marketing to weave a unified narrative across our entire product range. Additionally, they will forge strong partnerships with the regional marketing teams to solidify our position as market leaders, curate impactful content, and ignite demand for new customer acquisition, expansion, and cross-selling opportunities.       Your Impact:         Product Marketing Strategy & Planning: Drive thoughtful product marketing plans and budgets that are comprehensive in nature and cover the spectrum of initiatives needed for business goals - vision/thought leadership, enablement, analyst initiatives, and customer awareness and adoption.     Go-to-Market Strategy: Product Marketing is responsible for supporting revenue attainment and growth. This role will be responsible for the go-to-market strategy and for influencing teams across areas of the business that impact performance, starting with a close relationship with sales and demand generation teams.     Product Positioning and Messaging: Describe the platform in terms of its ability to solve market problems and create crisp and compelling messages that drive market acceptance and growth. Capture the imagination of economic buyers and IT professionals with a fresh and creative approach.     Thought Leadership: Generate insightful & compelling content (webinars, blogs, e-books, etc.) to influence customers, buyers, industry specialists, research analysts, key editors in the press, and other third parties.     Sales Enablement and Content: Work closely with sales to understand their challenges and needs relative to selling the offering. Develop and deliver relevant training. Create and maintain a playbook of sales tools to help Sales succeed.     Demand Generation: Work closely with the demand generation team to develop campaign strategy, deliver campaign assets, monitor, and measure effectiveness, and develop plans to exceed revenue goals.     Event and Sales Support: Provide product and market expertise for tradeshows, webinars, and seminars. Provide ongoing support for the sales channel.     Working with a global team of A-players: You will be working with a tightly coupled cross-functional team of highly talented and experienced professionals. There is a high focus on execution and organization, but we dont let formal processes get in the way of opportunity or experimentation.     Customer and Competitive Intelligence: Identify and validate urgent, pervasive problems in the market by interviewing customers, recent evaluators, and potential buyers. Map their needs with target markets, analyze competitor and alternative offerings in the market, assess their strengths and weaknesses, and develop a strategy for winning against the competition.         Your Experience:         7-10 years of solid background in B2B technology product marketing required. Knowledge of the IT Operations Management (ITOM) market that includes network and infrastructure monitoring, observability, systems management, application management, and related markets would be beneficial.     Demonstrative analytical skills as well as a passion for product analysis, competitive analysis, and market dynamics with a strong ability to synthesize market data and provide solutions even on short notice or constrained deadlines.     Creative ability to craft product messaging that resonates and connects with the diverse demographics of the target buyers and users of the SolarWinds Platform.     Must have the ability to influence all personnel levels and collaborate with cross-functional teams in Sales and Marketing to drive toward a single unified direction.     Possess an apparent and seasoned business judgment that will earn the trust and respect of the team, peers, and executives.     Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex material to both technical teams and consumers in a way that relates effectively to each audience.     Ability to navigate and thrive in a cross-functional, highly matrixed environment on a global scale.     Experience producing creative, technical content, and acting as a key influencer and spokesperson in the market.     Bachelor s degree required; advanced degree MBA/MS desirable.
column11: Customer acquisition, Analytical skills, Business transformation, Sales, Competitive analysis, IT operations management, Solarwinds, Competitive intelligence, Product marketing, Marketing strategy

column2: Overview The scope of the role is to own all analytics requests + priorities, investment strategy for the marketing team, from forecasting/budgeting analysis, to post-campaign reporting, to all data collection/input/validation of ROI engine models.  This role works closely with eComm sales teams, eComm Performance Marketing teams, and the ROI Engine team.  This role will perform monthly/ quarterly deep dive analysis on performance marketing campaigns vs agreed KPIs and in particular ROI which will critically make recommendations on how to optimize the eComm marketing strategy & A+M budgets required to drive Pepsico growth.  This role will also lead eComm sufficiency modelling and A+M spend tracking vs budget. Responsibilities Overall, this role partners closely with several teams eComm Customer Marketing, eComm Brand Marketing, and eComm Search marketing teams to conduct regular and ad hoc analysis to better drive media investment and optimization decisions geared towards incremental growth for the eCommerce business. Partner with Customer & Brand Marketing teams on various analysis: A/B testing, Campaign impact measurement, Investment strategy, Financial forecasting, and retailer data partnerships.  Partner with Data Science and Tech teams to consult on retailer data warehousing and architecture, automated reporting/dashboards, and ROI engine.  Lead ROI Engine process on behalf of eComm Marketing collect, clean, and submit all Customer and Search Marketing campaign data; validate data and reporting output at various stages of ROI Engine model. Tracking A+M spend vs budget and complete sufficiency modelling to feed into critical PEP processes i.e. AOP. Qualifications Bachelors degree in a quantitative field (e.g. statistics, economics, mathematics, business administration, marketing); Masters degree preferred. 10+ years of experience in marketing/media strategy & analytics and measurement; preferably in the CPG/FMCG space and for a Global company. Experience in omnichannel marketing, attribution, A/B and Multivariate test design and implementation, and ROI measurement Robust experience in the languages of data manipulation (e.g. SQL, R) and in visualization (e.g. Tableau, Datorama) High proficiency in Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint. Mastery of data, ingest, manipulate and model data Strong organizational skills, with the ability to effectively manage projects and communicate effectively Strong communication skills (both written and verbal) and the ability to distill complex ideas down to clear and concise business findings and recommendations Requires a high level of regular/daily interaction and co-ordination with several teams A positive, pragmatic attitude and deliver consistently with impeccable attention to detatil and deadlines, high degree of accountability while working independently, ability to deal with ambiguity.
column11: Marketing, marketing campaigns, Marketing management, media strategy, Marketing strategy

column2: We are hiring for multiple roles for our client based in Gurugram.  Local candidates preferred.  Year of Inception-1999 Employee strength-30+ Work timings - 9:30 A.M.-6:00 P.M. (Monday to Friday) 10:30 A.M.- 4:00 P.M. (Saturday) 6 days working (2nd & 4th Saturdays off and Sunday off)  Marketing executive - 0 -2 years Assistant Manager -  3 -4 years Manager/Senior Manager - 4 - 7 years About our client:  We are hiring for an integrated marketing firm with over 25 years of experience in  Food & Beverage marketing.  We continue moving forward to get a jump on the latest innovations, understand the hottest trends, and work with various international brands and boards to develop creative, impactful strategies engaging with key stakeholders in India and South Asia.    Our core expertise is assisting international groups in establishing and enhancing their market presence through innovative  trade, industry outreach, consumer and media campaigns. We have over 20 years of experience in promoting U.S. high-value food products  and fresh produce to India, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka, and Nepal. Our 20+ agricultural  specialists have in-depth knowledge and experience in trade outreach,  marketing, market research, trade policy and regulatory affairs to guide our clients through the intricate maze of bureaucratic, legal, and  cultural obstacles facing U.S. agricultural exports to the region. We have crafted and  executed path-breaking campaigns for several U.S. Co-operators and are  known for our innovative approach. We have extensive experience of working closely with the U.S. Agricultural Trade Office, Market Access  Program (MAP) and the American Embassy staff. Having worked with several  commodity groups and international growers, we have the requisite  understanding of the FAS documentation requirements and handling  projects for different commodity groups. The team is also well versed  with the various USDA project activities like MAP, EMP, GBI, QSP and has  experience in writing reports and documents as per USDA guidelines and  requirements, like UES (Unified Export Strategy), CPR (Country Progress  Report), etc.                            DESIRED PROFILE Marketing executive - Improving brand presence and campaign execution across trade through excellence in in-store planning, execution and tracking in alignment with the annual marketing priorities      Leading and implementing channel specific marketing strategies and plans for assigned retailers      Conceptualizing and executing trade promotions and rolling out impactful in-store campaigns in collaboration with marketing and sales teams      Leading activation programs with partners to improve brand visibility      Visiting the points of sales regularly to ensure that the brand is visible, and guidelines are respected.      Devising actionable strategies from customer insights      Bringing the consumer perspective to marketing decision making by executing market analysis and research activities to provide insights and recommendations      Identifying ideal methodology and providing oversight on the data collection process and analytic work plan to ensure all available information is generated to support business needs      Leveraging research data and information to proactively identify business opportunities and gaining internal support to act upon these opportunities      Conveying analysis and recommendations via presentations and written reports,        5+ years, in a similar role in organizations which are into FMCG, Nutrition, OTC or telecom.        Desired Candidate Profile:          You have a degree in Marketing, Business Administration or related field.      You have prior experience within Trade Marketing.      You have strong analytical skills with the ability to leverage on data to develop strategy/decisions and are comfortable dealing with numerical data.      You are familiar with putting together data from multiple sources to tell a story.      You are strategic thinker with strong communication, interpersonal skills and presentation skills.      You thrive in matrix environments and are adept at influencing and coordinating with different stakeholders.        Here is an excellent opportunity to be associated with an organization having tremendous potential for growth. Operations have already started in Mumbai, Gujarat, Pune, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Delhi and Chennai.    We require self motivated and smart candidates with a thirst and zeal for unending knowledge and ambitions to make it big in life.        Compensation / Salary :    Fresher Graduates CTC will be INR 2,50,000/- per annum plus allowances, mobile expenses, and unique incentives. MBA fresher s, CTC will be INR 3,00,000/- per annum plus above-mentioned perks. Candidates with up to one year of work experience will be considered. Compensation depending upon their current CTC however not more than INR 3,00,000/- per annum.      The candidate will be on six months probation, post six months based on the performance he/she will be a confirmed team member of the company.      JOB DESCRIPTION    :          We require B-Pharma / B.Sc (Biology, Biotech, and Botany), or candidates having below one year of work experience. MBA fresher s can also be considered.      Excellent English Communication and thorough Scientific Knowledge is a MUST.        At least basic understanding and communication in English language is required since it is a specialty division of Dermocosmetic. Candidates who wouldn t be able to communicate in basic English language shall be rejected          Establish the concepts of all products and effectively communicate them to doctors      Utilize selling skills effectively to generate the demand and business from doctors      Execute the plan, agreed with Scientific Sales Manager, effectively and give regular feedback regarding the same      Conduct CMEs and group meetings as agreed.      Focus on updating one s knowledge and skill      Achieve Sales as well as Activity Targets      Develop KOLs on basis of business and clinical interests.          3 rounds of interview Telephonic round, 2-3 personal rounds of interview      Once we receive the resume of the candidate, we will conduct a telephonic round of interview with the candidate. Those candidates who are shortlisted through the telephonic round of interview would be appearing for further rounds of interview.      Interviews will be on Skype or at office.        The company is a fast-growing healthcare company with operations in major metros of India. they are Business Associates in India for Catalysis, S. L., a multinational company based out of Spain. It is dedicated to research and development of products in the Dermo Cosmetic. they also have few pharma formulations under their own label.

column1: Digital Mktg Advisory Associate Manager-Marketing Operations
column2: Skill required:Digital Marketing - Content Moderation  Designation:Management Level - Associate Manager  Job Location:Mumbai  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:10 to 14 years  What would you do? Role  Summary  A visual design director oversight production of impactful graphics that are coherent and consistent, but at the same time impressively unique, based on visual fundamentals and theory of design. This role will own the design practice and delivery across one or more accounts. Will be responsible for overseeing multidisciplinary design teams to create ideal solutions for clients. This role also manage Design Leads, collaborate with primary stakeholders, and work with program leadership to plan future projects (timeline, estimations, forecasts, etc.) Scope & Complexity:  Requires analysis and solving of high complex problems. May create new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures to guide teams and projects.  Requires to set the strategic direction relates to team and projects goals.  Will be accountable for multiple projects or teams.  Primary interaction with clients and leadership stakeholders, as a direct supervisor.  Comfortable with ambiguity in a fluid organization.  Deeply understand the market and can speak to our clients. The Content Moderation team focuses on reviewing photos, videos, and text-based content and make judgments as to whether reviewed content is in violation of our Client's terms of services. They review content that may be sensitive in nature. They ensure every piece of content in violation of the client's terms of services is accurately identified and flagged for action in a timely manner. What are we looking for? Adaptable and flexible  Ability to perform under pressure  Problem-solving skills  Detail orientation  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Data visualization, infographics design and tables.  Advanced knowledge on Master Template best practices (Design parameters and rules in composition, layout, typographic hierarchy, use of color palettes, image and object mask, etc.).  Vector-based import & export best practices  PPT design tools proficiency  Sequence-based layouts and design to achieve optimal content-storytelling  Slide animation and transition expertise  Optimize assets and file weight  Online and remote workflow mastery for multiple file users Job Specific Experience, Education and Skills  +8-10 years of relevant experience in visual or graphic design, and creative team management.  Good written and oral communication skills  experience with driving and applying user-centered design processes.  experience with rapid prototyping methods, ranging from paper sketching to digital prototypes.  requirements gathering and communication between all design teams, workstreams and clients  Demonstrated expert creative problem-solving skills to help establish a look and feel for a given project, evaluate a creative approach, brainstorm, think, and respond quickly while delivering unexpected, original, and innovative ideas  Have a strong portfolio that demonstrates aesthetic & strategically creative solutions.  Is open-minded and demonstrates flexibility and optimism in adapting to change.  It is required to fluently speak English and Spanish to work with clients from LATAM, North America, and others around the world. Determine how best to approach visual design regarding accessibility variables such as color, contrast, size, etc.  Knowledge with Agile work cycles, Waterfall and/or other methodologbies. Roles and Responsibilities A visual & verbal storyteller, delivering insights about people & behavior in a way that generates empathy, emotion, & engagement from the client & design team. Drive design quality, practice, & offerings that meet business & user goals as well as create new offerings. Lead design points of view, proposal creation, & relationship management across several clients. Assess performance & provide career guidance & performance decisions for members of the studio Design team. Provide directional oversight of individual project team's work & assume overall accountability for it. Develop pitch decks & project approaches that lead to exciting, inspiring, & well-shaped work for our Design team. Cultivate relationships with new & existing clients. Defines team workflow, roles & tools & coordinates it with management & development. Leads brainstorming sessions with the team & promotes team alignment. Creates templates/style guides for client brands, through processes that encourage free thinking & creativity without boundaries. Leads & managing production projects for new campaigns. Provides creative & art direction & accurate time estimations on design tasks. Lead client presentations. Communicates with client to discuss & finalize the design of grids & layouts. Makes recommendations for improvements in reports, tools, processes & assigned tasks pertinent to the design capability. Negotiate deadline changes when needed due to changes in client requirements. Proactively identifies & mitigates risks & assigns appropriate owners to prevent issues & enhance performance. Identifies ways for team members to better engage in knowledge-sharing & collaboration across teams. Shares best practices & lessons learned. Promotes need for innovation in the team & influences team members to provide suggestions to improve work processes & enhance results. Establish, develop, & guides relationship with team members & stakeholders. Raises questions & concerns keeping the team's objectives in mind & works towards solutions that will enhance team performance. Proactively identify business opportunities within the vertical. Develop & promote skills in related areas to benefit team/organization. Juggle multiple projects while effectively managing timelines & expectations. Justify design decisions eloquently & explain visual concepts from the visual language & creative rationale, & pitch them to the team & stakeholders in an engaging & convincing manner. Provide effective feedback & direction to other team members. Manage & organize the internal & external assets & deliverables repositories.

column1: Digital Mktg Advisory Associate Manager - Marketing Operations
column2: Skill required:Digital Marketing and Campaigns - Digital Marketing  Designation:Management Level - Associate Manager  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:10 to 14 years  What would you do? Be a part of the Marketing Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of Accenture. We power our client's business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth. We are looking to hire passionate and innovative leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in digital marketing and delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. You will be working as a part of the Digital Marketing & Campaign team which helps clients with their digital campaign & digital marketing requirements. They help provide various services around list pull, list hygiene & lead uploads, providing data-driven insights to clients, and help them get better ROI from their various digital marketing initiatives. The team is primarily accountable for performing list pull from Client Database by writing complex SQL queries. They also leverage popular tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Workfront Work Management Software, Atlassian Jira, etc. A generic term for the marketing of products or services using digital technologies, mainly on the Internet, but also including mobile phones, display advertising, and any other digital medium.  What are we looking for? Search Engine Marketing (SEM)  Social Media Marketing  Programmatic Campaign Management  Data Analytics  Ability to establish strong client relationship  Results orientation  Ability to work well in a team  Strong analytical skills  Problem-solving skills  Account Management Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of moderately complex problems  Typically creates new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures  The person requires understanding of the strategic direction set by senior management as it relates to team goals  Primary upward interaction is with direct supervisor or team leads  Generally interacts with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture  The person should require minimal guidance when determining methods and procedures on new assignments  Decisions often impact the team in which they reside and occasionally impact other teams  Individual would manage medium-small sized teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts
column11: digital marketing, adobe creative suite, search engine marketing, social media marketing, atlassian jira, data analytics, sql queries, advertising, roi, campaign management, marketing, campaigns, display advertising, sem, work management, marketing operations

column1: Ecommerce Marketplace - Senior Associate/ Assistant Manager/ Manager
column2: We are currently hiring an Ecommerce Marketplace Manager who will be responsible for managing the platforms and global marketplaces and ensuring achievement of annual targets in terms of revenue and operating expenses.     Main Responsibilities of an Ecommerce Marketplace Manager   - Devising strategies that harness sales-related insights, prevailing standards, and novel developments to encourage sales in various platforms   - Creating frameworks that transform into highly profitable brand   - Creating promotional offers and checking to see that these are uploaded precisely   - Reviewing copy and legal disclaimers to verify their accuracy   - Analyzing traffic to inform website the effectiveness of marketing strategies   - Examining sales-related metrics to inform restocks   - Reporting on the utility of existing and novel strategies   - Driving the sales performance of the e-commerce platform   - Managing and executing promotional campaigns   - Providing insights on customer shopping trends to support assortment selection and identify assortment gaps   - Working closely with demand planning and warehousing teams in order to ensure smooth order fulfillment   - Providing analysis and reporting on metrics such as weekly/monthly sales by department, new product sell-through and offer code performance     Roles and Responsibilities   - Manage and create product listings, order fulfillment, inventory, price, queries advertisements on e-commerce platform   - Marketplace Management   - Listing products on the marketplaces and ensuring they are well represented there   - Managing Returns and order cancellations with proper tracking   - Handling customer support via phone, email and chat, if required   - Improve and increase the online traffic through various digital media platforms, as necessary   - Able to resolve online technical issue   - Create Campaigns to ensure increase in sales   - Maintain good ROI on the spend   - Single-Point-of-Contact for all Platforms   - Implement marketing strategies, promotional campaigns and activities to drive sales within given guidelines   - Prepare sales forecast and own the sales targets   - Ensuring brand guidelines are maintained   - Improvise or develop internal SOPs to meet marketplace compliance requirements   - Inventory management inventory forecasting   - Payments and reconciliation   - Measure and prepare reports on P/L, RoAS/ACoS (Advertising Cost of Sale) and other relevant KPIs; documenting and achieving turnover/sales targets   - Resolve any escalations and challenges with the marketplace   - Liaise with finance team and reconcile payments   - Review processes and procedures followed and make recommendations based on learnings   - Responsible for managing growing the eCommerce marketplace business.   - Open up new third-party eCommerce platforms by listing relevant categories products.   - Build on the existing business by adding new categories and product portfolio listings on the marketplaces.   - Work closely with the team to build the brand on e-comm platforms.   - Product Portfolio management Assist the team with product sales and category performance inputs to optimize the product portfolio from time to time.   - Oversee the day-to-day marketplace eCommerce operations, customer service, updates, post listings, promotions, merchandising, maintenance and performance.   - Stay up-to-date with the promotional calendars and plans of eCommerce platforms.   - Drive category interventions.   - Gather intelligence from eCommerce platforms to further strengthen the brand s offering.     Key Requirements   - You have a degree in Marketing, Business Administration or related field.   - You have prior experience in a similar role. Experience within digital marketing is a plus.   - You possess a solid understanding of e-commerce market place frameworks.   - You have a self-starter mentality with the ability to manage multiple projects in a fast-paced working environment.   - You have a high level of attention to detail including proven ability to manage multiple, competing priorities simultaneously.   - You are a creative and strategic thinker with a strong customer orientation.   - You have excellent interpersonal and communication skills and are adept at building relationships with different stakeholders.

Designs, develops, and implements marketing programs to support and position Researcher Academys (RA) content, products, and services, overseen by the RA Project Manager.         Ensures that the RA website provides up-to-date and comprehensive product/service information that is easily available to existing customers and users.         Participates in the user journey design and supports the improvement of the usability of websites and/or other new media technology platforms.         Supports and coordinates live webinars and on-demand content.         Maintains the RA platform, uploads new content, and reports back on any site issues to the Project Manager.         Plan and execute marketing campaigns for example: emails, banners, social media posts, webinars, promotional access and web marketing.         Ensure all relevant marketing material is produced within brand guidelines and distributed to required locations and channels on time.         Effective support for exhibits presence including planning, scheduling, and execution, specifically ensuring all the exhibit materials are delivered at exhibit location/booth as expected.         Keeps key stakeholders informed of progress development of all relevant issues.                 Requirements             Requires a college or university degree in marketing, publishing or a similar field of and 3-5 years experience in digital marketing and product marketing.         Solves routine problems using existing procedures and standard practices.         Fluent in spoken and written English.         Strong communication, and interpersonal skills to forge partnerships (both internally and externally).         Works effectively across different teams and functions with a collaborative mindset.         Basic IT awareness and skills (Excel, PowerPoint, Word, etc).         Project management skills.

column2: 01) Develop and implement strategies with the marketing team.   02) Help startups with their marketing efforts.   03) Generate reports on marketing and sales metrics.   04) Ideate and coordinate with the marketing design and content teams.   05) Contribute to collaborative efforts and organize events.   06) Conduct workshops and seminars.   07) Ability to independently lead and execute projects.   08) Excellent organizational,  interpersonal and communication skills.   09) Willingness to travel as needed.   10) Ability to thrive in a fast- paced,  dynamic start- up environment.    QUALIFICATIONS 01) Bachelor s or Master s degree in business,  marketing,  communications or a related field    02) 1 -  2 years industry experience    03) Proficient in using social media and analytical skills    04) Prior experience at an investment firm,  incubator is preferred    Amrita TBI is the only one incubator which very effectively supports hardware startups in India. Acceleron Labs couldn t think of any other better physical incubation other than Amrita TBI. The way Amrita TBI executes their plans are awesome and physical incubation space available at Amrita TBI Kollam,  Bangalore and Coimbatore are excellent    We greatly benefitted from technical and business mentorship provided. We started getting recognition and traction after we won Amrita TBI Pitchfest    Amrita TBI is the rarest of the rare among the various startup incubators in India. I am particularly happy that Amrita TBI is recently ranked among Top 5 prolific incubators in India and mentored more than 200 startup ideas. I am delighted to see that Amrita TBI nurtures,  supports and facilitates startups and also helps a lot of young startups and entrepreneurs. I wish Amrita TBI to scale up and support many more startups.    We have been tremendously benefited from the incubation including the network,  funding and value they brought on to the table. Amrita TBI has been always start- up friendly in their terms of engagement and investments. I can confidently say Amrita TBI stands among top incubators in India    The ecosystem Amrita TBI offers and most importantly advantage of incubating inside a university helped us to get constant guidance from professors and a continuous knowledge. It has been a wonderful experience and simply the best spent year I could have imagined for taking steps to start my own business

column2: Position Summary        Mithi is seeking a talented, motivated, energetic self-starter to join our rapidly growing enterprise technology company. The right candidate will have a passion for inbound and content marketing, an eye for detail, a newsroom mindset and excellent writing skills.        Required Qualifications, Skills Experience        2-4 years experienced. Exceptional freshers can be considered.          MBA or equivalent degree in marketing.          Understands and is interested in technology.          You have mastery over spoken and written English with strong articulation skills.          You are an excellent storyteller outstanding writing and proofreading skills -- writing samples required.          Diligent and "moronic" at execution.          A flexible worker who can stretch on demand.          Excellent people and management skills to interact with staff, colleagues and cross-functional teams, and third parties.        Roles, Responsibilities and Key Result Area        This role is the "engine" of our brand building and lead generation marketing strategy, where you would need to "manage" the creation and promotion of content assets designed to attract, engage and convert our core Mithi target audiences: CIOs, IT Directors, and IT Admins.          You will plan, manage and execute marketing routines such as webinars, PR, events, etc and also timely creation of blogs, white papers, infographics, guides, reports, videos, podcasts, slide share presentations, and more, ensuring content is leveraged through campaigns and channels. The right candidate will have a passion for inbound and content marketing, an eye for detail, a newsroom mindset and excellent writing skills. This role requires a knack for measurement: 20% of time will be spent analyzing the results of content initiatives.          This position will report to the CMO directly. He or she will work closely with the rest of the content team, broader marketing team, vendors, and internal product teams to conceptualize, develop and promote effective marketing content.          You will manage the companys digital presence and that of the key people - marketplaces, social media, profiles, etc.          You will be the final editorial gatekeeper for content created by team members. Edit for structure, purpose, content, voice, and grammar. Help to develop and report on content metrics and track content performance.          You will work closely with cross functional teams to build and execute. go-to-market strategy for segment and global content.          Be the expert on your buyers, how they buy and their buying criteria; be the expert on your competition and how to crush them.          Growth in relevant inbound leads from the various marketing channels.          Growth in the engagement quantity and quality of active communities and conversations around our product and solutions.          Growth in popularity and inbound connections/links to our company/site/social media platform.

column2: The Walmart Brand Manager will be responsible for developing and executing the brand strategy for an ecommerce company that sells on the Walmart.com Marketplace. The successful candidate will work closely with cross-functional teams to drive brand awareness, improve customer engagement, and increase sales across the company's product portfolio on Walmart.com Marketplace.                 Responsibilities:         -Develop and execute a comprehensive brand strategy for the company's product portfolio on Walmart.com Marketplace, in line with the company's overall objectives.     -Conduct market research to identify customer needs, preferences, and trends to inform brand strategy and messaging for Walmart.com Marketplace.     -Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and product development, to ensure consistency in brand messaging and customer experience on Walmart.com Marketplace.     -Develop and manage brand guidelines, including visual and written communication standards for Walmart.com Marketplace.     -Develop and execute marketing campaigns to promote the company's brand and products on Walmart.com Marketplace.     -Manage relationships with external agencies and vendors to ensure quality and timely delivery of brand-related projects for Walmart.com Marketplace.     -Monitor and analyze brand performance metrics on Walmart.com Marketplace, such as customer engagement, sales, and brand awareness, and adjust the brand strategy accordingly.     -Ensure compliance with brand standards across all channels and touchpoints on Walmart.com Marketplace, including product listings, digital assets, and customer service.     -Stay up-to-date with Walmart.com Marketplace policies, industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies that can be leveraged to enhance the company's brand on Walmart.com Marketplace.               Requirements:         -Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.     -Minimum of 5 years of experience in brand management, preferably in the ecommerce industry with a focus on Walmart Marketplace.     -Strong strategic thinking and problem-solving skills.     -Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     -Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.     -Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.     -Familiarity with ecommerce tools and technologies, including Walmart Marketplace Seller Center, analytics, and advertising tools.     -Knowledge of Walmart Marketplace policies and best practices.

column1: Senior Manager Digital Marketing - US Shift
column2: Senior Manager Digital Marketing (US Shift) Fullstack Academy is a top-ranked immersive school for tech skills training. Fullstack offers comprehensive training opportunities across the U.S. and prepares students with the in-demand skills they need to launch fulfilling tech careers. "Fullstack Academy has been a life-changing experience" is something we hear often and the reason why we come to work every day. Were working on changing lives and communities with our programs and were looking for a Digital Marketing Manager to ensure every prospective student, alum and employer partner has a fulfilling experience across touchpoints. ABOUT THE ROLE As the Manager, Digital Marketing, you lead our learner cultivation and monetization efforts, including referral marketing  using all the tools and best-practices of CRM and CRO, and harnessing the power of data and automation. You are a Hubspot black belt, but that is just the beginning of your broad, full-funnel marketing skill set.  You will own Fullstack Academys contact strategy by building, optimizing and reporting on campaigns across email, SMS, phone, and other related communication channels to various audiences (prospective students, enrolled students, alumni, employers, and more).  You should be confident and comfortable as a direct contributor; while there is potential to grow the team, you will be primarily involved in execution and implementation, working closely with internal stakeholders across marketing and other teams. You will work closely with Fullstack Academys marketing team members to execute initiatives across Web Analytics, Search Engine Optimization and Conversion Rate Optimization areas as well as support the planning, tracking, and execution of campaigns.  You will use your lead management and analytics skills to monitor data hygiene and establish scalable marketing operations practices, as well as manage implementation and tracking of conversion rate optimization (CRO) tests and user experience (UX) processes to improve Fullstack Academy?? growing website portfolio.  This is a full-time, US-based remote role that will report to the Director of Performance Marketing. This role may require travel a couple of times a year. RESPONSIBILITIES In this role, you will: Own and oversee the contact strategy for prospective learners, including email, SMS, website chat, and testing into other communication channels  Support and evolve all aspects of Fullstack Academy?? marketing operations across systems including CRM,  marketing automation, web analytics, and other marketing technologies Identify opportunities for marketing technology and process improvements, working cross-functionally to develop solutions that improve marketing and enrollment efficiency and agility Oversee the launch, maintenance and monitoring of HubSpot workflows and automated marketing campaigns that support evergreen and seasonal Marketing and Enrollment initiatives Work with the Data Analytics team to track and measure key marketing results across various channels, campaigns, programs and geographies by building schemas, methods and processes Manage and improve website performance through UX research, CRO tests, and other feature enhancements Support the Paid Media team in determining the best channels of lead quality by building closed feedback loop systems across our digital marketing properties QUALIFICATIONS  You are a great candidate if you have: 5+ years of experience in digital marketing operations 2+ years of supervisory experience, overseeing direct reports and/or external partners Deep level of hands-on experience with the HubSpot MAP & CRM  Clear understanding of common CMS and website functionality, with project management experience in order to guide the web development team?? work on the backend and frontend of Fullstack Academy?? website properties Data-driven with a deep understanding of data management best practices and solutions Strong project management skills with excellent communication and time management abilities Experience interpreting and translating technical language to non-technical stakeholders Understanding of CAN-SPAM email and 10DLC SMS requirements as well as inbox deliverability standards Experience partnering with multiple departments in a rapidly changing environment, including the functions of brand marketing, paid media, academics, enrollment, student support, and career success The ability to work independently with a high degree of autonomy A strong work ethic and experience developing effective communication strategies under time constraints Ability to process and prioritize requests from multiple departments and teams A passion for tech, education, and helping others that inspires excitement about our mission You are an exceptional candidate for this role if you also have: Marketing experience in education, edtech, or technology Experience scaling up digital marketing operations in a high-growth environment Previous experience with Craft CMS

column2: Role Responsibilities and Description:        The Digital Marketing Manager will be in charge of developing and executing digital marketing strategy; to manage a digital marketing team and to promote and support growth, and achieve the company s goals of sales, profitability and brand awareness.      We don t need our Digital marketing manager to sell ice to an inuit, but help people realise that ice and inuits are worth travelling to experience and photograph.      If you re as passionate about marketing as a child is about a packet of Cheetos, and as good at it as o Ronaldo is in coaxing a football into the net, do apply.      And if you can already see yourself as marketing head at Toehold, apply the instant after reading the following:        Here s what you ll do in the role:          Devise, develop and implement the company s marketing strategies the marketing reins will be in your hands!          Be an excellent Marketing Funnel designer and manager.          Coordinate and collaborate effectively with internal teams to set and achieve goals it s all a game; a team game!          Facilitate and participate in fairs, conferences and other marketing-related events the more outgoing you are, the better!          Work with communications team for branding, public relations, advertising and other marketing efforts and material we want to talk the walk!          Define and coordinate marketing programmes don your director s hat!          Develop and handle marketing annual budget get money to work!          Use analytics and market research to refine strategies review, analyse, reform, repeat!          Maintain relationships with business partners, clients and company staff together we re stronger!          Manage a small team of SEO, Paid, Social Media, Content Writers and Designers to guide them to glory.          To do all this and more, we need you to have:          Understand SEO, PPC, Social Media Marketing, Content Marketing and be a master of Google Analytics.          Graduate or Post-graduate degree in business management we need to know you do know what you know to know!          At least 3 years experience in leading a marketing team and between 6-8 years of overall work experience just so we rest assured your shoulders are seasoned!          Demonstrated record of high performance and quantifiable achievement let your merit speak for itself!          Excellent oral and written communication, and presentation and interpersonal skills to wax eloquent about how cool we are!          Considerable analytical ability to know what you re doing right, or wrong, and do more right than wrong!          Familiarity with the travel and/or photography industry desired for a head start!          Leadership and negotiation skills remove obstacles and show the way!          Ability to be organised and deliver within defined deadlines time kept is time earned!

column2: KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:   The Manager Digital Marketing is responsible for driving the digital channel with a primary focus on traffic and conversion for all of the business lines associated with IIW Hosting. This Manager Digital Marketing is responsible for defining and implementing digital strategies to: attract ,  acquire ,  retain ,  and grow customers. In addition ,  he / she will lead a team responsible for shaping and delivering the online shop / buy experience by experimenting ,  testing ,  and implementing the best solutions to drive qualified leads and ultimately revenue. This Manager will report to the CEO directly and lead a team of professionals and direct reports.   JOB COMPLEXITY:   Create an innovative environment that emphasizes a hypothesis - driven mindset and deep data - driven insights to drive outcomes for prospects ,  customers ,  and the business. Lead the creation and presentation of digital marketing analytics dashboards that can be understood by all key stakeholders. Understand key drivers for performance and determine detailed forecasting to accurately predict ongoing campaign success. Partner with product teams and eCommerce team on strategies and tactics that deliver business outcomes for website visitors. Be the IIW Hosting thought leader and evangelist for digital marketing ,  partnering with and influencing other business owners within marketing ,  helping to develop comprehensive communication plans for digital tactics. Partner with leader of product management to ensure seamless end - end experience ,  clear roles and accountability between teams. Effectively partner with the sales organization and other channel teams to ensure that the web strategy and solutions are integrated across all customer and prospect touch points. Drive processes to identify best practices and optimize the customer experience based on data from site visitors ,  user testing and others in the industry. Strong management of agency resources and outcomes to deliver on objectives ,  budget and timelines.   EXPERIENCE  /  EDUCATION:   Bachelor's degree or equivalent in marketing ,  communications or business. Master s degree from an accredited university preferred. 10+ years B2B corporate ,  digital or product marketing. Experience with B2C marketing initiatives preferred. With at least 5 years of management experience.   KNOWLEDGE  /  SKILLS  /  ABILITY:   Manager must be an expert at developing and managing digital marketing strategy and priorities for the digital channel. This manager will deliver on business unit and group - level conversion and revenue goals ,  including lead generation campaigns across multiple target markets. The manager will lead the digital marketing team in focusing and prioritizing as necessary to execute the strategy most efficiently and effectively. This includes overseeing and directing workflow of complex projects and ensure that these projects are delivered on - time and within budget. The manager needs to have a good working knowledge of different ad networks. The manager will have knowledge of paid search technologies. The manager will be an expert at leading development of digital marketing plans to extend awareness and reach of the brands ,  products and services to build engagement. This includes experience putting together and executing / managing the execution of cross - digital media plans; including social ,  SEO ,  and other paid media. Manager will expertly recruit and maintains a high performing organization ,  including ensuring the team has the resources ,  skills ,  and capabilities it needs to effectively execute and that the team has best in class engagement ,  as measured within IIW Hosting. This manager should have a firm grasp of attribution and related technologies to aid the building of dashboards for monitoring channel performance. A manager with experience leading digital strategies across EMEA ,  APAC and US is highly beneficial. Proven team leadership in a customer - driven marketing organization. Proven leadership skills in matrixed organizations leading through influence. Advanced understanding of web analytics (specifically Adobe Analytics Sitecatalyst) with the ability to report on data and make recommendations for iterating marketing and campaign strategy for continuous improvement. Experience identifying ,  negotiating with ,  and managing external agency partners to deliver world class marketing. Familiarity with Agile development processes a plus. Proven ability to create an environment that fosters learning ,  teaching ,  growth ,  risk - taking ,  innovation and fun. Highly organized with outstanding verbal and written communication skills. Be hands - on and able to complete tasks alone as well as within a team of different personalities ,  have a positive attitude ,  and adapt to growing operational structuring. Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office (Excel ,  Word ,  PowerPoint and Outlook) as well as Salesforce or other CRM and CMS technologies for driving conversion.

column2: Elligible candidate can share their resumes on resume@proplegit.com We are looking for an SEO, SEM & SMM Digital Marketing Expert having 4 to 5 years of experience to be a part of the Marketing & Sales Operations team that is leading the managed services arm of ESMSYS.  We power our clients business through the integration of insights, data, and technology. We are focused on activating and scaling the best brand experiences, to deliver breakthrough marketing-led growth, cost-effectively, across all digital consumer touchpoints and channels. The value we bring to clients boosts their marketing efficiency and effectiveness that powers their growth.  Were looking to hire passionate and innovative Leaders in Marketing Operations with deep domain expertise in Digital Marketing that includes SEO, SEM & SMM while delivering cutting edge marketing services across a range of clients and industries, bringing with them strong operations acumen and transformative leadership. Key Responsibilities: Digital Strategy Development: o Develop and execute a comprehensive digital marketing strategy aligned with business goals. o Identify and capitalize on emerging trends and opportunities in the digital landscape. SEO, SEM and SMM: o Optimize website and website content for search engines (SEO) to improve organic search rankings and SEO marketing. Trouble shoot webmaster issues, Improvise On-Page, Execute Off Page activities, hands on. o Manage, optimize and give triple growth to our pay-per-click (PPC) campaigns to drive targeted traffic and conversions. Content Marketing: o Develop and oversee content marketing strategies to create engaging and shareable content. o Collaborate with content creators to ensure alignment with SEO and Marketing goals and brand messaging. Social Media Management: o Manage and enhance the company's presence on social media platforms. o Develop and implement social media campaigns to increase brand awareness and engagement. Email Marketing: o Plan and execute effective email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers. o Implement segmentation strategies and analyze performance metrics for continuous improvement. SMS and WhatsApp Marketing: o Plan and execute effective SMS and WhatsApp marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers. o Implement segmentation strategies and analyze performance metrics for continuous improvement. Analytics and Reporting: o Monitor, analyze, and report on key performance metrics using tools such as Google Analytics, Social Media Dashboards, Power BI and other Reporting tools. o Provide insights, strategies and recommendations to optimize and grow digital marketing campaigns.
