column2: As a Digital Marketing Manager at Aniview, you will be responsible for managing and executing our digital marketing strategies, with a focus on Search Engine Optimization (SEO), WordPress website management, and Paid Advertising campaigns. This role requires a blend of technical skills, creativity, and analytical ability.         Key Responsibilities:         SEO Management:           Develop and implement effective SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and visibility.             Conduct keyword research, competitor analysis, and SEO audits.             Optimize website content, landing pages, and metadata for search engine ranking.             Monitor and analyze SEO performance using tools like Google Analytics, and adjust strategies as necessary.           WordPress Website Management:           Manage and maintain the companys WordPress website.             Ensure website functionality and perform regular updates and backups.             Implement website changes and improvements in line with SEO and user experience best practices.             Collaborate with content creators to ensure consistent and SEO-friendly content.           Paid Advertising Campaigns:           Plan, execute, and manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn.             Monitor campaign performance and optimize for maximum ROI.             Manage ad budgets and track spend.             Analyze campaign data to identify trends and insights, and report on performance.           Qualifications:           Bachelors degree in Marketing, Engineering, Business, or a related field.             Minimum of 3 years of experience in digital marketing, with a focus on SEO, WordPress website management, and paid advertising.             Proficient in SEO tools (eg, SEMrush, Moz, Ahrefs) and Google Analytics.             Experience with WordPress website management, including themes, plugins, and security best practices.             Strong skills in managing and optimizing paid ad campaigns on various platforms.             Excellent analytical, organizational, and project management skills.             Strong communication and teamwork abilities.

column2: Develop and implement digital marketing strategies    : Create comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with the companys goals and target audience. This includes identifying target markets, competitor analysis, keyword research, and determining appropriate marketing channels.            Website optimization    : Ensure the companys website is optimized for search engines (SEO). Conduct keyword research, optimize meta tags, improve website structure, and work on increasing organic traffic and search engine rankings.            Content marketing    : Plan and execute a content marketing strategy to increase brand awareness and engage the target audience. Create compelling and informative content such as blog posts, case studies, whitepapers, and video tutorials related to WordPress and the companys products.            Social media management    : Manage and grow the companys presence on social media platforms such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram. Develop engaging content, run social media campaigns, interact with followers, and use social listening tools to monitor brand mentions and customer feedback.            Email marketing    : Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and engage with existing customers. Create targeted email lists, design appealing newsletters, and analyze campaign performance using metrics such as open rates, click-through rates, and conversions.            Paid advertising    : Plan and execute paid advertising campaigns using platforms like Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads. Monitor and optimize campaign performance, track conversions, and ensure the highest possible return on investment (ROI).            Analytics and reporting    : Use tools like Google Analytics to track website performance, user behavior, and campaign effectiveness. Generate regular reports on key metrics and provide insights to improve marketing strategies and tactics.            Collaborate with the development team    : Work closely with the development team to understand new product features, updates, and releases. Collaborate on website improvements, landing page optimization, and ensuring smooth integration of marketing campaigns with the website and plugins.            Market research    : Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitor activities. Conduct market research to identify new opportunities, potential partnerships, and areas for growth.            Customer relationship management:    Build and maintain strong relationships with existing customers. Collect customer feedback, address queries and concerns, and identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling the companys products.            Conversion rate optimization (CRO)    : Continuously optimize website and landing pages to improve conversion rates. Conduct A/B testing, analyze user behavior, and implement changes to enhance user experience and drive more conversions.            Training and knowledge sharing:    Stay informed about the latest digital marketing trends, tools, and techniques. Share knowledge and best practices with the marketing team and other stakeholders within the company.

column2: Job Description Senior Digital Marketing Manager - IT Jobs        1 - 2 Years            Up to 3 Lacs            Chennai     Our client is a global branding service provider and is looking to hire a digital marketing manager. It s a brand engaged in the business of branding in India and across the globe. The company is building its branding business with a major dependency on lead generation. It uses digital platforms to reach out to appropriate customers across the globe for its various products. The candidate for the position of digital marketing specialist should be a self-starter with the desire to take on the challenge of developing a comprehensive digital strategy for the company through the use of Adwords, SEO/SEM, Social Media, and other platforms. They should be focused on generating a consistent flow of customer leads for the company.         Job Details:           Job Title:    Digital Marketing Manager       Education Qualification:    Any Graduate       Mode of Interview:    Face to face HR Round       Job Responsibilities:       Listed below are some key responsibilities and eligibility criteria for the position of Digital Marketing Manager     Execute campaigns across multiple search engines.     Have strong analytic and decision-making skills to identify problem areas and the ability to take immediate corrective actions.     Strategize SEO activities.     Develop & lead keyword/content strategy.     Work on developing keyword ranking reports.     Monitor, track, & report on Web Analytics metrics.     Create campaigns on a regular basis to continuously optimize the website and through ORM methodology.     Manage SEO and email marketing for national and international lead using Google Analytics to continuously mine the data, modify and change as required. So what is viewed, what works and how do we ensure valid lead generation.     Design and execute campaigns digitally via SEM and social media to build tough leadership through the usage of Facebook, Twitter, Blogs with the umbrella of ORM.     The track leads from various sources, engage with the leads, study analytics and refine campaigns and approaches.       Job Requirements:       Minimum 1-2 years of experience as an SEM/ PPC Manager or Search Specialist.     The analytical and logical approach to problem-solving.     Strong understanding of HTML, XHTML, Google Analytics, or any other Web Analytics Software is a plus.     Google Adword Professional certification is a plus.     In-depth knowledge of the latest SEO techniques & terminologies is a plus.     Good communication skills and a keen interest in marketing strategy development is a must.

column2: We are looking for a Digital Marketing Manager to develop, implement, track and optimize our digital marketing campaigns across all digital channels.           What does a Digital Marketing Manager do    You should have a strong grasp of current marketing tools and strategies and be able to lead integrated digital marketing campaigns from concept to execution. Digital marketing managers will work with the marketing team, supporting teams (such as programmers), and clients to launch campaigns on time and on budget.         RESPONSIBILITIES        Plan and execute all digital marketing, including SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns.     Design, build and maintain our social media presence.     Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs).     Identify trends and insights, and optimize spend and performance based on the insights.     Brainstorm new and creative growth strategies.     Plan, execute and measure experiments and conversion tests.     Collaborate with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize the user experience.     Utilize the strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touchpoints.     Instrument conversion points and optimizes user funnels.     Collaborate with agencies and other vendor partners.     Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate.           REQUIREMENTS        Require a graduate or postgraduate. Any certification/advance training into marketing is a bonus.     Proven working experience in digital marketing of at least 4 years.     Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media and/or display advertising campaigns.     Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate.     Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels.     Solid knowledge of website analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, WebTrends).     Working knowledge of ad serving tools (e.g., DART, Atlas).     Experience in setting up and optimizing Google Adwords campaigns.     Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints.     Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking.     Up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices in online marketing and measurement.

column2: You are passionate about building industry leading products that help millions of small businesses succeed with their online marketing goals. Dedicated to customer-first innovation. Printvenue is currently seeking an energetic and experienced to join our Digital Marketing team.   The responsibility for optimizing the performance of your product portfolio via both the management of the lifecycle of existing products and introduction of new digital products. You will define a vision for your products, influence the organization to deliver against your vision and lead a focused engineering team towards your goals. You will also work closely with cross functional teams, including design, marketing, analytics, support and the digital leadership team to help Printvenue become the small business partner for online marketing products and services.   JOB DESCRIPTION:   MUST HAVES:   Research the competitive landscape, gleaning competitive and customer insights that help drive strategic direction for marketing products within the digital product portfolio with specific focus on Identity products and/or Marketing products. Size up business opportunities based on customer value as well as financial value. Create a product roadmap and deliver against the goal of improving customer experience and value for your product portfolio. Gather requirements for Design team to deliver improvements to existing products, as well as new products. Partner with our marketing teams to define go to market strategies for your products, including site merchandising, CRM, PR and various acquisition strategies. Oversee the relationship with service providers to drive improvements to our customers experience with our products. Become an expert in understanding our customers and their needs and leverage these insights to introduce innovative solutions to problems. Prioritize opportunities based on a broad definition of value. Collaborate effectively with numerous stakeholders across the organization around the world, including, other product managers, Engineering, Analytics, Marketing and Support to define the optimal product offering and bring those products to market with a disruptive value proposition. A Bachelor s Degree in Business, Science or Engineering, with an MBA as an added plus. At least 3-8 years of experience in Product Management, Product Marketing or Product Design/Development. Experience in a complex global organization serving millions of customers is preferred. Experience in building digital products is highly desirable, as is experience in E-commerce/online retailing/CRM. Required to do action and comfort in turning ambiguity into strategic execution plans. Strong written, oral communication skills.

column2: Working at Oportun means enjoying a differentiated experience of being part of a team that fosters a diverse, equitable and inclusive culture where we all feel a sense of belonging and are encouraged to share our perspectives       This inclusive culture is directly connected to our organizations performance and ability to fulfill our mission of delivering affordable credit to those left out of the financial mainstream     We celebrate and nurture our inclusive culture through our employee resource groups        POSITION SUMMARY    ?       Marketing Technology and Data at Oportun sits at a unique intersection of marketing, engineering, and analytics     We are looking for a data-focused technologist with experience driving a marketing technology stack to support high growth initiatives     As a member of the Marketing Data and Technology team, you will play a key role in building scalable consumer marketing programs by working across the organization with the Growth & Analytics, Product Marketing, and Engineering teams     You will power how Marketing comes to life at Oportun by managing and integrating 1st party data, tracking and contact configurations, developing data flows, and shipping web or app based solutions           RESPONSIBILITIES       Own the overall vision of Oportuns first-party data strategy and the entire marketing technology stack that drives it     Manage, configure and troubleshoot all aspects of our marketing technology stack such as Oportuns customer data platform, website, and communication & activation engine     Have a deep understanding of our first party data, its structure, and where it comes from to consult on its usage across the organization     Drive the advancement of first party data capabilities, while helping Oportun develop a competitive edge by monetizing first party data driven use cases     Accelerate the transition away from batch marketing and toward always-on, omni-channel, dynamic marketing journeys     Own marketing technology budgets, contracts, and vendor relationships     Work in collaboration with the Growth Analytics, Product Marketing, and Engineering teams to identify and execute marketing performance improvements     Help manage the data pipelines between marketing technology vendors and internal databases via API and webhooks; manage and validate JavaScript tags and image pixels to ensure proper data tracking     Contribute to the development of customer data and product expansions     Closely monitor emerging trends in marketing technology, media, and privacy, and ensure Oportun remains compliant     Manage a technical marketing technology manager               REQUIREMENTS       8+ years of relevant experience (marketing technology, marketing data strategy, marketing analytics and data engineering, or similar role; financial services, marketplace, ecommerce, or adtech agency preferred)     Deep understanding of first-party marketing data solutions, like identity stitching and data privacy dependent of 3rd-party cookies, and what it takes to implement them     Deep passion for solutions development and problem solving     Understanding of and familiarity with modern marketing capabilities     Must be fluent in SQL (Redshift preferred), Javascript a plus     Must have experience with REST APls

column2: Barn Willow is a direct to consumer online home decor brand making custom window draperies, shades and home accessories more accessible. We believe buying window treatments that fit your windows and decor should not be as hard as it is and should not cost you a fortune. So, we came up with Barn Willow - With our unique supply chain we by-pass all middlemen and work directly with textile manufacturers to bring the premium most quality of Linens, offered at 1/3rd the retail price. With our Auto-Sizing technology we are removing your window measurement hassles.       Were looking for a highly experienced product marketing analyst to join the team. This is a contract to hire position. Our ideal candidate is someone who has developed marketing analytics and B2C email marketing program at a relevant consumer product company.      Your core responsibilities:        As a Product marketing analyst you will play a pivotal role in helping shape our product marketing strategy through data and analytics.         Deeply study all our marketing channels, small or big and make strategic recommendations to help us identify channel wise fund allocation.         Analyze customer behaviour, product usage and our email marketing channel to design and implement a more intelligent/targeted email marketing program which will increase user engagement and channel revenue.          Deeply analyze our sales funnel, customer acquisition channels and customer segments to continuously A/B test and identify ways to improve cart abandonment rate, increase site conversion, time to place an order and average order value.          Identify our repeat transaction patterns and develop a plan to increase repeat rate.           Bachelor s degree in quantitative discipline (Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Engineering or Computer Science)         5+ years of highly relevant experience studying large sets of data and developing marketing analytics       Product marketing analytics experience with eCommerce consumer products companies (B2C)       Excellent communication skills and should be able to effectively create reports and present the findings to the team       Experience with SQL, Google Analytics and any other statistical analysis tools     Experience with email marketing programs like Mixpanel and Mailchimp       Experience with setting up A/B tests using Google testing tools and Optimizely       Team oriented and loves the energy of a startup environment.      Remote work is acceptable for this role    Some perks of working at Barn Willow    Were a venture backed startup and offer competitive salaries, equity so youre part of the Barn Willow family and a lucrative bonus     Employee discounts for any BW window coverings for you or your loved ones     Free snacks, coffee and those rejuvenating herbal teas     Oh and did we mention team lunches and happy hours     Were dog friendly -so bring your cute bundle of joy with you at work.

column2: Work Experience    5 to 10 years of experience as Marketing Manager, preferably working with Hospital Industry for minimum 2 years.        Educational Qualification    Any Medical Graduate with M.B.A (Marketing) or M.H.A. from a recognized university or college.        Other Skill and Competencies    Excellent communication skill and interpersonal skill, verbal and written English.      Microsoft Office Window based PC applications.        Summary    Hospital Marketing Manager is designed for commercial teams looking to understand and improve their market share within the local health economy. Through the mapping of activity rates, trends and market share, users can better understand their own activity patterns, competitor analysis and plan for the future.          Role Responsibilities:            Formulate brand plan and propose various Marketing strategies in accordance to corporate policy for hospital brand.          Take care of all the publishing material of the hospital namely: information booklet, leaflets, handbills, brochure, and other related materials. These shall include the content, design, creativity and proof reading etc.          Plan various activities as per the phase wise Marketing Strategic plans.          Execute the various activities planned as per the phase wise Marketing plans for example, CME s, Workshops Camps, Patient Education Program and Life Style Management Program Etc.          Achieve high level of brand visibility with intense marketing communications.          Carry out research activity related to marketing plan evolved.          Brand Planning, Re branding Activity Planning.          Enhancing Brand Value through different channels/Mode of Marketing Sales, Corporate Sales, Corporate communications, Corporate Sales team handling.          Explore newer geographical area new markets, for customer target for hospital.          Explore new product feasibility for business plan.          To do regular fieldwork to understand and develop sound marketing plan.          Monthly detailed report of the activity should be submitted to the management.          Weekly progress report should be submitted in brief to management about the activities assigned.          Conceive, design, and implement marketing activities like direct marketing campaigns, Outdoor promotions, Directional signage, Market development programs, corporate Medical Brochures, Promotional Leaflets, Direct Mailers/newsletter, hospital journal, Event calendar, Website maintenance, Arranging PR meet Press Conferences, Advertisement plan (Print/Electronic/Radio) and other co-branding programs.          Facilitating and developing business through corporate, embassies, insurance companies, PSU, semi Corporate/ Institutional, Social institute, RWA clubs and International Channels.          Establish and nurture relationships with nursing homes, clinics diagnostic centers, leading physicians and practitioners for the purpose of obtaining referral business to the hospital.          Online and Digital promotion (Website development, Website management, Search Engine Optimization, Social Media Optimization, Mobile App etc.)          Management of existing upcountry OPDs and to identify more potential regions to start more such OPDs of Referral Doctors. Branding, Tie-ups with Hospitals, Promoting and setting up the satellite units (SBU s) for hospital Periphery promotion.          Providing direction, motivation training to the field sales team for ensuring optimum performance for all operational sales related departments.          Conceptualizing implementing plans/policies based on goals set by the organization.          Increasing direct business through community based activities, health awareness programs, health camps, etc.          Business planning and analysis with team for assessment of monthly, quarterly yearly performance. Analysis of sales vs. expense, outstanding recovery, volume sales, competitor analysis.          Establish contacts with smaller health care facilities, including clinics and diagnostic centers for the purpose of obtaining business to the hospital.          Define and drive the digital strategy of the unit including the websites and all other digital platforms (FB, Twitter, LinkedIn, Whats App, Orkut, etc.)

Supporting the commercial teams in achieving their business goals.          Developing and executing a data-driven marketing plan for the market by tracking all organization level initiatives- Evaluating promotional plans to ensure that they are consistent with product line strategy and that the message is effectively conveyed.         Maintaining and managing the content release calendar with consistent and repeatable distribution strategies.          Managing release of content from communications teams in social media, BTL promotions, static media and offline sales capability training interventions.         Working closely with the communications team to develop publicity material for approaching different organizations, and providing input on communications and messaging in brochures, websites etc. with implications for business partnerships. You have significant experience in product, B2B and/or Channel/Partner Marketing Management preferably in the science.         You are a strong leader, and you are comfortable working cross-functionally with other teams to gain the knowledge needed to inform your strategies and report on wins and opportunities.         It would be nice if you possess strong Interpersonal skills to be able to communicate internally externally at all levels.         You have the inclination to use technology as a tool for all marketing strategies and offerings.

column2: Indus Appstore   , a leading app discovery platform in India, is seeking a passionate and creative    Product Marketing Manager    to join our growing team. In this dynamic role, you will play a critical part in driving user engagement and brand awareness for the Indus Appstore.         About the Role:           Craft Compelling User & Developer Content:    You will collaborate with the Indus CRM team to develop engaging content for push notifications and email campaigns targeted towards end users and developers. This includes crafting clear, concise, and persuasive messages that drive app usage, promote new features, and foster strong relationships with both audiences.           Elevate Indus Curation Efforts:    Partner with the Indus Curation team to create captivating product descriptions and brand copy. Your expertise will help highlight key features and benefits of curated apps, ultimately influencing user downloads and engagement.           Champion New Feature Awareness:    Work closely with the Indus Product and PR teams to develop compelling communication strategies for promoting new features within the appstore. This may involve crafting press releases, creating social media campaigns, and collaborating on engaging in-app announcements.           Stay Ahead of the Curve:    Remain up-to-date on mobile marketing trends, user behavior patterns, and best practices in mobile apps distribution. Leverage your insights to develop data-driven marketing campaigns that maximize user engagement and brand awareness.         Qualifications:         Minimum 3-5 years of experience in product marketing, mobile marketing, or a related field.     Proven track record of developing engaging content and marketing campaigns that drive user engagement and brand growth.     Strong understanding of user acquisition, retention, and growth strategies within the mobile app ecosystem.     Excellent writing and editing skills with the ability to adapt tone and style for various audiences (users, developers, media).     Experience with content management systems (CMS) and email marketing platforms is a plus.     Familiarity with data analysis tools and the ability to translate data insights into actionable marketing strategies.     A passion for mobile apps and a keen eye for detail.     Excellent communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills.

Search Engine Optimization (SEO): Optimize website content and structure for search engine visibility and rankings, conduct keyword research, and implement SEO best practices to drive organic traffic and improve search engine rankings.             Social Media Management: Manage and grow our social media presence, including creating and scheduling content, engaging with followers, running social media campaigns, and monitoring social media analytics to identify opportunities for engagement and growth.             Paid Advertising: Plan and manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads, including budget allocation, targeting, ad creation, and performance monitoring.             Analytics and Reporting: Monitor, analyze, and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns, using tools such as Google Analytics and marketing automation platforms, and provide insights and recommendations for optimization.             Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO): Identify opportunities to optimize the user experience, website design, landing pages, and conversion funnels to maximize lead generation and conversion rates.             Email Marketing: Develop and execute email marketing campaigns, including segmenting audiences, creating email templates, writing compelling copy, and analyzing campaign performance.             Market Research and Competitor Analysis: Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify industry trends, target audience preferences, and emerging opportunities, and incorporate findings into marketing strategies.             Collaboration and Coordination: Work closely with the design team, content team, and development team to align marketing initiatives with overall company goals and ensure consistent messaging and branding.                       Requirements              Experience: Minimum of 5+ years of experience in digital marketing, preferably in a B2B or technology-related industry.                      Digital Marketing Expertise: In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in planning and executing digital marketing campaigns across various channels, including SEM, social media, email marketing, content marketing, and display advertising.                     SEO Knowledge: Strong understanding of search engine optimization (SEO) best practices, keyword research, on-page optimization, and link-building strategies.                     Paid Advertising Skills: Proficient in managing paid advertising campaigns on platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads, including campaign setup, targeting, and performance tracking.                     Analytics and Reporting: Proficiency in using digital analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, marketing automation platforms) to track, measure, and analyze campaign performance and generate actionable insights for optimization.                     Content Marketing: Familiarity with content marketing strategies, including content creation, distribution, and promotion across digital channels, and the ability to develop compelling and engaging content.                     Social Media Management: Experience in managing social media platforms (e.g., Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) for business, including content creation, engagement, and analytics

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Digital Marketing Manager to join our team. The Digital Marketing Manager will play a crucial role in developing and executing digital marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, customer engagement, and revenue growth. The ideal candidate will be a creative and analytical thinker, possessing a deep understanding of digital marketing channels, trends, and technologies.          Responsibilities:              Digital Strategy Development:            Develop and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with company goals and objectives.        Identify target audiences and create customer personas to tailor campaigns effectively.            Search Engine Optimization (SEO):            Optimize website content for search engines to improve organic search rankings and visibility.        Conduct keyword research, monitor website performance, and implement on-page and off-page SEO techniques.            Pay-Per-Click (PPC) Advertising:            Plan, execute, and optimize PPC campaigns across platforms like Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media.        Monitor campaign performance, manage budgets, and adjust strategies to achieve optimal ROI.            Social Media Marketing:            Manage and curate social media profiles, creating and sharing engaging content to build brand presence.        Develop and execute social media advertising campaigns to target specific audiences.            Content Marketing:            Create and oversee the production of compelling and relevant content for blogs, articles, videos, infographics, etc.        Develop a content calendar and distribution plan to maximize content reach and impact.            Email Marketing:            Develop email marketing campaigns, including creating segmented lists, designing templates, and monitoring performance metrics.        Implement A/B testing to optimize email open rates, click-through rates, and conversions.            Analytics and Reporting:            Utilize tools like Google Analytics to track website traffic, user behavior, and campaign performance.        Generate regular reports with actionable insights, highlighting successes and areas for improvement.            Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO):            Identify conversion bottlenecks on the website and in campaigns and implement strategies to improve them.        Conduct A/B testing on landing pages, CTAs, and other campaign elements to increase conversion rates.            Team Collaboration:            Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, content creators, and developers, to ensure cohesive marketing strategies and campaigns.            Market Research:            Stay current with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in digital marketing.        Conduct competitive analysis and research to identify new opportunities and areas for growth.                  Requirements      Qualifications:            Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.        Proven work experience as a Digital Marketing Manager or similar role.        In-depth knowledge of various digital marketing channels, tools, and best practices.        Strong understanding of SEO, SEM, PPC, social media, content marketing, and email marketing.        Proficiency in analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Google Ads, and social media insights.        Excellent analytical, project management, and multitasking skills.        Creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box and propose innovative ideas.        Strong written and verbal communication skills.        Experience in team management and collaboration.

column2: Job Description    This is a 100% remote full - time position. All of our current Team is in Asia or Europe and so we prefer to hire people from Europe and Asia because of team collaboration. It is unlikely (although not impossible) that we will hire in North America.   If you have had 3 years experience in marketing and are looking to progress to the next level ,  then this could be an exciting career move for you.    We are searching for an experienced ,  technical and self - driven Marketing Manager to create and lead our marketing team! As a Marketing Manager ,  you will mainly be responsible for developing and implementing all the marketing strategies with a clear focus on demand generation and content creation.   Must - Have Job Responsibilities:    -  Lead generation: define personas and create nurturing inbound and outbound campaigns based on needs assessment ,  verticals and territories using marketing automation systems.    -  Email campaign: develop prospect and customer segmentation ,  conduct analysis and create targeted and differentiated value propositions for an array of personas.    -  Content creation: create original and a variety of content in different mediums: Website copy ,  emails ,  landing pages ,  collateral; optimize Web content with SEO best practices.    -  Sales support: streamline the marketing to sales lead qualification process and provide sales tools ,  e.g. ,  corporate and product PowerPoint presentations ,  to expedite the sales cycle; must have participated in some sales methodology and training ,  such as solution selling ,  and familiar with pipeline stages.    -  Website: have design and navigation experience as well as content strategy experience for nurturing specific personas.    -  Marketing strategy: conduct competitor SWOT analysis and identify market trends.    -  Graphic design: create concepts for visuals for both internal and external campaigns and collaborate with graphic designers to execute them.    -  Reporting: create monthly reporting of all Marketing deliverables ,  status of projects ,  identify obstacles ,  provide solutions to overcome those obstacles.    -  Events: assist with major conferences ,  including booth design ,  invitation management ,  logistics ,  multimedia requirements and conference participation for analysts.    -  Internal communications: participate in internal sales and research analyst calls.    -  Social media: develop awareness and thought - leadership campaigns.    -  Create a marketing team Qualifications  -  At least 3 years experience in marketing (SaaS ,  a plus)    -  Being customer - centric    -  Hands on experience with CRM and SEO tools like Google Analytics ,  Google Adwords ,  etc.    -  In - depth knowledge of big data analysis    -  Regularly produce and present reports    -  Excellent organizational and time management skills    -  Good communication and interpersonal skills    -  Excellent presentation skills    -  MA in Marketing ,  Management or similar relevant field    -  Addition marketing certifications are a plus    -  This is a remote position

column2: As a Demand Generation Manager, you will play a critical role in driving the company's growth by developing and executing strategic demand generation initiatives. You will be responsible for creating and implementing campaigns that generate interest, leads, and pipeline for the sales team. The ideal candidate possesses a strong blend of strategic thinking, creativity, and analytical skills to drive effective demand generation programs.       Key Responsibilities:     1. Implement a comprehensive demand generation strategy aligned with overall business objectives.   2. Nurture the leads through different stages to ensure they are qualified to become MQLs.   3. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and engineering, to ensure alignment of demand generation efforts with overall company goals.   4. Campaign Planning and Execution:   a. Design, execute, and optimize multi-channel demand generation campaigns across digital and traditional channels.   b. Utilize a data-driven approach to target the right audience segments and deliver relevant content at each stage of the buyer's journey.   5. Work closely with the content team to ensure that the contents are targeted to the right audience and are promoted in the most effective channels.   6. Align the campaigns with company s plan of attending events and conferences along with engineering roadmap.   7. Stay aligned with the marketing planner and suggest changes in it as per the demand generation strategy and campaign timelines.   8. Plan and implement lead generation programs to capture and nurture leads throughout the sales funnel.   9. Collaborate with the sales team to ensure seamless handoff of marketing-qualified leads (MQLs) to the sales team.   10. Monitor, analyze, and evaluate the performance of demand generation campaigns.   11. Use key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess the effectiveness of campaigns and make data-driven recommendations for optimization.   12. Utilize marketing automation tools, CRM systems like HubSpot and other technology platforms to execute and track demand generation campaigns.   13. Stay up-to-date about industry trends and technologies to increase campaign effectiveness.   14. Should be hands on with AI based tools required to make demand generation campaigns more effective.       Qualifications:     1. Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Advanced degree is a plus.   2. Proven experience in demand generation, preferably in B2B technology or SaaS companies.   3. Demonstrated success in planning and executing multi-channel marketing campaigns.   4. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and translate it into actionable insights.   5. Experience with marketing automation platforms, CRM systems, and other relevant marketing technologies.   6. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.   7. Creative thinker with the ability to generate innovative ideas for campaign execution.   8. Results-driven mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding targets.       Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):     1. Marketing Qualified Leads (MQLs) generated   2. Conversion rates at each stage of the funnel   3. Return on Investment (ROI) for demand generation campaigns   4. Pipeline contribution and revenue generated from demand generation activities   5. Campaign engagement metrics (click-through rates, open rates, etc.)

Strong analytical skills with proficiency in using analytics tools.         In-depth knowledge of digital marketing channels, strategies, and best practices. column2: Product Marketing is the connective tissue between Product Management, Sales, and Marketing       Product Marketing Managers (PMMs) are expected to go deep and understand the product, develop a strong understanding of our audience (both software buyers and functional users), and combine this into creating a compelling narrative for the product and communicating it through our company s go-to-market machinery                   PMMs are expected to work across sales, marketing, product management, implementation, and customer success teams to understand not just the features but also the overall business advantage that our solutions create for our clients     PMMs use this insight to deliver this information to prospective clients in a way that is easy to access, simple to understand, and highly believable                            Key Responsibilities:                                 1. GTM Strategy: Work with ABM, Online Marketing teams to develop and execute demand gen program with an objective to drive awareness and pipeline growth                                 2. Sales Enablement: Build and maintain sales enablement materials like one-pagers, data sheets, competitive battle cards and more; to help them effectively sell                                 4. Content Creation: Partner with the Content Marketing team to create compelling Thought Leadership and GTM content, including blog posts, whitepapers, videos and more                                 Qualifications and Skills:                             A Bachelors Degree                                                                Why Choose SMS-Magic                                     Strategic Excellence:                             At SMS-Magic, we empower our leaders to make strategic decisions that shape the direction of our company. As a senior-level leader, you will have the opportunity to showcase your expertise and drive the success of our organization.                                 Organizational Leadership:                             Join a company that values strong leadership. As a senior leader at SMS-Magic, you will have the chance to lead and inspire teams, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and high performance.                                 Opportunities for Growth:                             We believe in the personal and professional development of our entire team. You will have access to ongoing learning opportunities and the chance to further enhance your skills and expertise.                                 Cutting-Edge Technology:                             Immerse yourself in the latest advancements in CRM messaging. SMS-Magic offers you the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies, ensuring that you stay at the forefront of industry trends.                                 Collaborative Environment:                             Join a team of talented professionals and collaborate with individuals from diverse backgrounds. Your ability to effectively lead by example will drive innovation and contribute to the overall success of our company.                                 Work-Life Balance:                             We value the well-being of our employees. At SMS-Magic, we strive to create a work environment that promotes a healthy work-life balance, allowing you to excel in both your professional and personal life.                                 We re Already                                                         #1:                             SMS-Magic is a proven, global messaging platform provider for popular CRM platforms, with over 2500 customers across 190 countries. We need your experience, skills, and energy to continue our extraordinary growth momentum                                                                 Compensation & Benefits:                                     Attractive Salary:                             Enjoy a generous fixed compensation that recognizes your expertise and leadership. Bonus Compensation:                             Standout performance may lead to additional bonuses through our reward process, recognizing your exceptional contributions.                                 Comprehensive Insurance Coverage:                             We provide group medical insurance for you, your spouse, and two children, along with personal accidental insurance. column2: OVERVIEW        The Digital Campaign Manager will not only translate product priorities and campaigns into go to market plans but will act as the internal voice of the customer.      This individual will understand customer needs and motivations and make sure our activities and campaigns add value to every stage of the buyer journey.      The Demand Gen Manager will be an expert on buyer persona and motivations while delivering on the customer centric promise.      This is not about guesswork; we will work to integrate real-time data into every decision, always striving to do a better job.      The right person will think beyond leads and will be able to build and execute marketing programs that drive awareness, fandom and consideration among our buyers and learners.      The Demand Gen Manager will be comfortable with both strategy and execution. As an executional strategist, you will understand the overarching strategy while also being forensic when something goes wrong and be accountable and able to fix and improve.        OPPORTUNITY HIGHLIGHTS          Plan and execute digital lead gen strategy and end-to-end campaigns that clearly demonstrate and articulate the value of SumTotal s solutions and achieve business objectives.          Collaborate with marketing operations, content, product marketing, and other departments to deploy, optimize, and iterate campaigns across global market.          Identify and execute the right combination of channels and formats designed to engage our buyers and learners (i.e. social media, PPC, content syndication, paid media, email marketing, webinars, video).          Design and execute a lead nurture strategy that generates sales opportunities, reengages previous leads, and helps to accelerate opportunities through the pipeline.          Manage relationships and timelines with digital advertising vendors and internal stakeholders to gather, prepare, and deliver full funnel marketing campaigns          Regularly present digital marketing performance to internal stakeholders in understandable language to set and manage expectations regarding goal performance.          Pull and analyze key reporting data to ensure continual learning and optimization within digital marketing tactics.          Build and manage a tight relationship with sales, forging strong communication between teams.          Be the digital expert for the business unit. Always stay aware of future opportunities and be able to evaluate their usefulness for the SumTotal business.          SKILLS & QUALIFICATIONS          BA/BS degree or equivalent experience          7+ years of digital marketing with proven experience in identifying winning campaigns to connect with identified buyer personas with precision and replicability          Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple projects          Strong interpersonal, verbal, and written skills with the ability to communicate digital strategy and plans to executives throughout the business          Demonstrated critical thinking and ability to navigate obstacles, resolve issues, and effectively advocate for the demand gen team to capitalize on open opportunities.          Experience with a range of MarTech and analytics tools (Our stack includes Marketo, Salesforce, Google Analytics, Craft)          Strong knowledge of reporting and analysis within CRM (Salesforce) to inform campaign strategy in order to achieve KPIs          Experience with managing quarterly and annual budgets          Ability to collaborate with product marketing, content marketing, and public relations to generate clear messaging and drive tangible impact          Strong understanding of the marketing funnel and what influences success across the funnel          Excellent analytical skills and ability to aggregate data from multiple sources to make educated decisions on campaign optimization and spend across all marketing channels          Ability to be an amazing partner to the product team and create, communicate, and present marketing plans & budgets, progress, and results          Record of success in driving growth on a fast-moving team with multiple concurrent projects          A can-do attitude and a willingness to roll up your sleeves as part of the team

column2: &We are seeking young, dynamic professionals with contagious enthusiasm and a mind for out-of-the-box solutions to join our top-notch sales team.   NEW BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT   - Prospect potential new clients and turn them into long-term clients   - Identify potential clients and decision-makers and build relationships with them   - Gather client's business requirements and assist in driving strategy, planning, execution by communicating and collaborating with multiple stakeholders.   - Engage in an end to end project lifecycle ownership along with revenue and profitability   - Manage, schedule, and attend client meetings for projects   - Set up internal and client meeting agendas   - Schedule and conduct internal and client debriefs after project completion   - Travel to various locations within the country for the purpose of obtaining business   - Cold-calling within a specified market or geographic area to ensure a robust pipeline of opportunities   - Plan approaches and pitches. Work with the team to develop proposals that address clients' needs, concerns, and objectives   - Participate in pricing the solution/service   - Handle objections by clarifying, emphasizing agreements and working through differences to bring about a positive conclusion   - Use a variety of marketing styles to persuade or negotiate   CLIENT RETENTION:   - Present new products and services and enhance existing relationships   - Work with related departments within the organisation to meet customer needs   - Arrange for and participate in internal and external client debriefs   BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT PLANNING:   - Attend industry functions, such as association events and conferences, and provide feedback and information on market and creative trends   - Present to and consult with mid and senior level management on business trends with a view to developing new services, products, and distribution channels   - Identify opportunities for campaigns, services, and distribution channels that will lead to an increase in sales   - Using knowledge of the market and competitors, identify and develop the company's unique selling propositions and differentiators   MANAGEMENT AND RESEARCH:   - Ensure that data is accurately entered and managed within the company's CRM or other sales management system   - Forecast sales targets and ensure they are met by the team   - Track and record activity on accounts and help to close deals to meet these targets   - Present business development training and mentoring to members of your team   - Understand the company's goal and purpose in order to continually enhance the company's performance in the realm of business development   SKILLS & QUALIFICATION   - The required qualification is a bachelor's degree in any stream. A post-graduate degree would be a plus   - The necessary skills include team management skills, good networking, persuasive conversationalist, ease with public speaking, strong research ability, motivation for sales, prospecting skills, identification of customer needs and challenges, meeting sales goals, professionalism and knowledge of Microsoft Office

column2: What are we looking for      We are looking to hire a Senior Marketing Communication Manager who will be responsible to oversee many aspects of a campaign throughout the entire lifespan of a product, service or idea. Proven record in successfully handling multiple projects at a given time.          Hands on experience collaborating with Marketing Analytics, Product Marketers, and Creative development teams.          Should have knowledge of tracking (UTM creations DCM click trackers) and tagging.          Co-ordinate with team to implement full-funnel user acquisition strategies.          Should know CRM / Database Management system. column2: As the Lead Generation Manager, you will play a critical role in driving the growth and success of the organization by developing and executing effective lead generation strategies. You will lead a team responsible for identifying potential customers and converting them into qualified leads. Your expertise in lead generation techniques, data analysis, and team management will be essential in achieving revenue targets and expanding the customer base.   Responsibilities:      Lead Generation Strategy: Develop and implement comprehensive lead generation strategies aligned with the companys sales and marketing objectives.         Data Analysis: Utilize data-driven insights to identify target customer segments, evaluate lead quality, and optimize lead generation efforts for better results.         Marketing Campaigns: Collaborate with the marketing team to design and execute lead generation campaigns across various channels, including email marketing, social media, content marketing, SEO, paid advertising, events, and more.         Database Management: Oversee the maintenance and expansion of the lead database, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information for effective lead nurturing.         Lead Qualification: Implement lead scoring and qualification processes to identify and prioritize high-quality leads for sales conversion.         Collaboration with Sales: Work closely with the sales team to understand lead requirements and ensure seamless lead handoff for further engagement and conversion.         Performance Tracking: Regularly monitor and analyze key performance metrics related to lead generation efforts, providing regular reports to the management team.         Industry Research: Stay updated with industry trends and best practices in lead generation to drive continuous improvement and innovation.         A/B Testing: Conduct A/B tests and experiments to optimize landing pages, forms, and other lead generation assets.         Must have handled LinkedIn profiles efficiently and at least 10 CXO levels         Good knowledge of LinkedIn management & Newsletter Writing     Qualifications and Skills:      Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.         Proven experience of 2+ years in lead generation, demand generation, or digital marketing, preferably in a managerial role.         Strong understanding of lead generation strategies, techniques, and technologies.         Experience with marketing automation tools and CRM systems for lead management.         Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.         Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.         Leadership and team management skills to inspire and guide the lead generation team.         Goal-oriented and results-driven with a track record of meeting or exceeding lead generation targets.         Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities to devise innovative lead-generation approaches.         Knowledge of B2B or B2C lead generation dynamics and sales cycles.

column2: Designation:    Marketing Manager    Job Description:                Take your career to new heights with Netedge!                         Are you an experienced and passionate Digital Marketing Manager looking for an exciting new opportunity                   Reporting to the Chief Marketing Officer, you will lead the evolution of the digital practices and the processes for Netedge s Marketing department.       The role will require the successful candidate to work across all marketing channels to measure, optimize, improve, and personalize our digital demand generation programs. The role requires a solid understanding of demand generation marketing, and proven experience in B2B marketing, web, digital strategy and execution.               Technical Exposure:                Your Strategic Responsibilities:                               Plan and execute the go - to - market strategy for Netedge.                             Lead, implement and manage omnichannel marketing campaigns.                             Ensure our digital strategy is consistent across all channels, that we have one tone of voice.                                 Identify current and future trends to ensure that the digital marketing strategy is fresh by staying up to date with the latest innovations, technologies, changes in competition, and shifts in the digital landscape.                           Partner with the sales team to evolve lead management, scoring and nurturing, and improve visibility of the digital marketing - attributed pipeline.                                   Your Tactical Responsibilities:                                   Email Marketing       Using our CRM system and create compelling email campaigns that attract new customers and nurture existing clients.                               Paid Search        -  Creating effective campaigns that deliver real return on investment (AdWords and Paid Social).                               Remarketing       Setting up our remarketing efforts.                               Marketing Automation       Nurturing leads and automating as much of the process as possible.                               SEO       Analyse industry keywords and optimize the website.                               Social Media       Creating awesome content to be distributed via LinkedIn, Twitter and other social channels including our blog.                               Website Management       Generating traffic to our site and running web analytics.                               Reporting and Analysis       ensuring the correct reports are in place to allow us to test, learn and improve.                                   What are we looking for in a candidate                               Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and deliver results.                             Experience of working in a high - growth, rapidly changing environment, with evidence of creating revenue generating marketing campaigns.                             5+ years of B2B experience preferably in the E - commerce or SaaS sectors.                             Excellent communication, presentation, and time management skills, with the ability to handle multiple priorities simultaneously.                             5+ years of digital marketing experience, including a deep understanding of website operations, SEM/SEO, social media, paid digital media and affiliate marketing.                             Experience in using email automation platforms like HubSpot, Marketo, Pardot, etc.                             Basic understanding of web development, including HTML, CSS and database management.                             Experience in user experience and website optimization, usability studies and A/B testing.                             Have the ability to write compelling marketing copy.                                   What type of personality and soft skills are we looking for                               You are a results - driven, highly innovative marketer who is a lifelong learner.                             You will be a key member of our team, so we are looking for someone who is a strong communicator and collaborator                             You are excellent at working across teams, geographies, in a cross - functional setup and in a fast - paced environment                             You have strong attention to detail whilst keeping the top - level objectives in focus                             You have excellent quantitative analysis skills, with an intuitive mind and great problem - solving skills.                             You can set priorities, communicate them clearly and integrate feedback as and when the business needs to pivot.

column2: The Marketing Coordinator role is one where you support Smart WFM with the implementation of marketing initiatives and campaigns. The skill set both professionally and technically is quite broad but specific, ensuring a range of marketing elements can be actioned. It is a support role, one where specific direction and feedback will be provided.                  Market Research          There is always an ongoing need for some    market research    to be conducted. This may be competitor activity, country of origin research for trade shows, media follow up etc. Most of this market research will be simple and straightforward, done with a clear brief on the desired outcome.                  Social Media Implementation (External and Internal)         Implementation of social media campaigns - from liaising with graphic designers for corporate branding through to design work around and building of social media tiles    using Canva   . Ideally managing a number of ongoing social media campaigns including the Smart WFM harmony campaign, Jarrod McGrath institute, news and blogs.                Event planning and coordination         Smart WFM exhibits at many trade events throughout the year - Marketing activities include everything from promotional material to getting books printed. At the same time in 2023, we are looking to start having our own events and we will need event planning skills around this - venue research, ticketing, attendee liaison, shipping of material etc.                  Give back campaigns          This role will provide assistance with developing promotional campaigns (predominantly on social media) around Smart WFM give-back activity. The objective is to showcase at least one of these activities per month.                  Management of marketing assets          We need the Marketing Coordinator to be highly organised and able to help set up and manage the filing of all marketing assets (image library, branding materials, past promotional material etc).                  Liaise with external suppliers         There are a number of external suppliers involved in the marketing division of Smart WFM - graphic designers, event organisers, web developers etc. This role will require some coordination and liaison amongst these suppliers.                  Technical Skills          The individual or organisation will need to be proficient to a relatively high standard on the following - Trello, Hubspot (website, blogs, marketing, CRM), Canva and Teams.
column11: Promotional campaigns, Ticketing, Social media, Corporate branding, Marketing Coordinator, Market research, Event planning, CRM, Recruitment, WFM

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Sales and Marketing Team Lead to join our dynamic team. As the Sales and Marketing Team Lead, you will be responsible for overseeing and driving the sales and marketing efforts of our organization. You will lead a team of sales and marketing professionals, develop strategic plans, and execute effective sales and marketing campaigns to achieve company objectives. The ideal candidate has a strong background in sales and marketing, excellent leadership skills, and a proven track record of driving revenue growth.         Responsibilities:         Lead and manage a team of sales and marketing professionals, providing guidance, training, and support to maximize their performance and achieve sales targets.     Develop and implement strategic sales and marketing plans that align with company objectives and target market segments.     Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify sales and marketing opportunities and develop effective strategies.     Set sales targets and KPIs for the team, monitor progress, and take proactive measures to ensure objectives are met or exceeded.     Drive the development and execution of marketing campaigns across various channels, including digital marketing, social media, email marketing, events, and advertising.     Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as product management and operations, to ensure alignment and effective execution of sales and marketing initiatives.     Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients and strategic partners, identify new business opportunities, and nurture existing accounts.     Monitor sales and marketing performance metrics, generate reports, and present findings to senior management, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.     Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to continuously enhance the sales and marketing strategies of the organization.     Foster a positive and collaborative team culture, promoting knowledge sharing, creativity, and innovation.
column11: Product management, Marketing Manager, Sales, Email marketing, Senior management, Social media, Marketing campaigns, Team Leader, Digital marketing, CRM

column2: As a Field Marketing Specialist at greytHR, you will play a pivotal role in driving the success of our B2B SaaS HRMS solutions in the dynamic Indian market. You will be responsible for developing and executing comprehensive field marketing strategies, including impactful events, targeted campaigns, and regional market research             Preferred Functional Knowledge:       Field Marketing Strategy: Demonstrated ability to develop and execute comprehensive field marketing strategies aligned with overall business goals.     Event Management: Proficiency in planning, coordinating, and executing regional events, conferences, trade shows, and seminars.     Market Research: Strong analytical skills and experience in conducting local market research to understand regional trends, customer needs, and competitive landscapes.     Sales Collaboration: Proven track record of working collaboratively with sales teams, providing support, and aligning marketing activities to drive lead generation and pipeline growth.     Content Development: Exceptional content creation skills with the ability to develop compelling and region-specific marketing collateral, presentations, and promotional materials             Key Responsibility:       Develop and Execute Strategies for Leads Generation: Collaborate with the marketing team to create and implement comprehensive field marketing strategies for lead generation.     Event Planning and Management: Plan and coordinate regional events, conferences, trade shows, and seminars. Manage all aspects of event logistics, including budgeting and vendor coordination.     Local Market Research: Conduct market research to understand regional trends, customer needs, and competitive landscapes.     Sales Collaboration: Work closely with the sales team to align field marketing activities with lead generation goals. Provide sales enablement materials and support.     Content Development: Create compelling and region-specific content for marketing collateral, presentations, and promotional materials.     Digital and Social Media Engagement: Leverage digital and social media platforms to amplify the reach of field marketing activities.     Monitor and engage with online communities.     ROI Measurement and Reporting: Implement tracking mechanisms/ dashboard to measure the success of field marketing campaigns. Provide regular reports on key performance indicators (KPIs).     Adaptation and Optimization: Adapt strategies based on performance insights and changing market dynamics.     Optimize marketing initiatives for maximum impact.     Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment with overall business objectives.     Customer Engagement: Foster relationships with prospects and customers through effective marketing     initiatives.     Continuous Learning: Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in B2B SaaS field marketing.     Travel: Willingness to travel within the region as required for event attendance and market engagement.         ?       Qualification and Experience:       Bachelors degree in marketing, Business, or a related field.     Proven experience of at least 3 to 4 years in B2B field marketing, preferably in the SaaS industry.     Strong project management and organizational skills.     Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.     Proven ability to work collaboratively with stake holders.     Familiarity with marketing automation tools - Active Campaign/ HubSpot and CRM systems - Membrane).     Willingness to extensively travel within the region as required.         ?       Benefits:       Excellent Opportunity to be involved in high impact work and progressive learning environment.     Great team members & energy filled work environment.     Competitive salary.     Remote working.

column2: Who are we    Kolabro Business Solutions is a product startup based out of Sushant Lok,  Gurgaon.  We are building a B2B mobile app and other stack of products to help property brokers,  brokerage firms & developers to do their business more efficiently.  It is a platform where brokers will be able to manage leads,  their agents,  CRM and communicate seamlessly with the community using the Kolabro App.  Kolabro founding team consists of members from leading a digital media house & an Ex-Googler with over 15 years of combined experience in digital marketing at leadership positions.  At Kolabro,  we want to organize & support the Real Estate sector in India using technology.  A mammoth task equaled only by our zeal to work towards the goal.     Responsibilites:  We are looking for email marketing specialists who can create,  manage and execute multiple email campaigns for lead generation and reach purposes.  This role entails not only managing the campaigns but optimizing the databases and structuring the campaigns for best outcome.    Desired Skill Set:  At least 6 months experience managing email campaigns.  Freshers with significant knowledge/ excel knowledge are also welcome.  Working knowledge of running campaigns across Netcore,  Octane and other panels.  Strong understanding of warmup,  data segmentation and utilization.  Very strong understanding of evolving email space and how to effect greater inboxing.  Understanding of terms like CPM,  CPC,  CPO,  CPL,  CPV,  CLTV,  etc.  Ability to operate and manage databases and optimizing them in excel.  Extremely efficient with Excel - filters,  pivot tables,  segregations & excel commands.  Strong writing & communication  (especially listening)  skills.  Strong leadership & software estimation skills.  Detail oriented and ability to organize.  Very strong in analytical,  problem-solving and innovation skills.  Ability to manage multiple project pipeline
